````typescript
 450: export interface RuntimeLockRecord {
 451:     lock_key: string;
 452:     owner_id: string;
 453:     acquired_at: string;
 454:     heartbeat_at: string;
 455:     expires_at: string;
 456:     metadata_json: string;
 457:     updated_at: string;
 458: }
 459: 
 460: export interface AcquireRuntimeLockResult {
 461:     acquired: boolean;
 462:     lock: RuntimeLockRecord | null;
 463: }
 464: 
 465: function normalizeLeadListRow(row: LeadListRow): LeadListCampaignConfig {
 466:     return {
 467:         name: row.name,
 468:         source: row.source,
 469:         isActive: row.is_active === 1,
 470:         priority: row.priority,
 471:         dailyInviteCap: row.daily_invite_cap,
 472:         dailyMessageCap: row.daily_message_cap,
 473:         createdAt: row.created_at,
 474:     };
 475: }
 476: 
 477: export async function addLead(input: AddLeadInput): Promise<boolean> {
 478:     const db = await getDatabase();
 479:     await ensureLeadList(input.listName);
 480: 
 481:     const result = await db.run(
 482:         `
 483:         INSERT OR IGNORE INTO leads
 484:             (account_name, first_name, last_name, job_title, website, linkedin_url, status, list_name, lead_score, confidence_score)
 485:         VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, COALESCE(?, 'NEW'), ?, ?, ?)
 486:     `,
 487:         [
 488:             input.accountName,
 489:             input.firstName,
 490:             input.lastName,
 491:             input.jobTitle,
 492:             input.website,
 493:             input.linkedinUrl,
 494:             input.status ?? null,
 495:             input.listName,
 496:             input.leadScore ?? null,
 497:             input.confidenceScore ?? null,
 498:         ]
 499:     );
 500: 
 501:     // Mantiene la relazione lista<->lead anche quando il lead esiste gi√†.
 502:     const leadRow = await db.get<{ id: number }>(`SELECT id FROM leads WHERE linkedin_url = ?`, [input.linkedinUrl]);
 503:     const listRow = await db.get<{ id: number }>(`SELECT id FROM lead_lists WHERE name = ?`, [input.listName]);
 504:     if (leadRow?.id && listRow?.id) {
 505:         await db.run(`INSERT OR IGNORE INTO list_leads (list_id, lead_id) VALUES (?, ?)`, [listRow.id, leadRow.id]);
 506:     }
 507: 
 508:     return (result.changes ?? 0) > 0;
 509: }
 510: 
 511: function normalizeTextValue(value: string): string {
 512:     return (value ?? '').trim();
 513: }
 514: 
 515: function mergedLeadValue(current: string, incoming: string): string {
 516:     const normalizedIncoming = normalizeTextValue(incoming);
 517:     if (!normalizedIncoming) {
 518:         return current;
 519:     }
 520:     if (normalizeTextValue(current) === normalizedIncoming) {
 521:         return current;
 522:     }
 523:     return normalizedIncoming;
 524: }
 525: 
 526: export async function getLeadByLinkedinUrl(linkedinUrl: string): Promise<LeadRecord | null> {
 527:     const db = await getDatabase();
 528:     const normalizedUrl = normalizeLinkedInUrl(linkedinUrl);
 529:     const lead = await db.get<LeadRecord>(`SELECT * FROM leads WHERE linkedin_url = ?`, [normalizedUrl]);
 530:     if (!lead) return null;
 531:     lead.status = normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status);
 532:     return lead;
 533: }
 534: 
 535: export async function upsertSalesNavigatorLead(input: UpsertSalesNavigatorLeadInput): Promise<UpsertSalesNavigatorLeadResult> {
 536:     const db = await getDatabase();
 537:     const listName = normalizeTextValue(input.listName) || 'default';
 538:     const linkedinUrl = normalizeLinkedInUrl(input.linkedinUrl);
 539: 
 540:     return withTransaction(db, async () => {
 541:         await ensureLeadList(listName);
 542:         const existing = await db.get<LeadRecord>(`SELECT * FROM leads WHERE linkedin_url = ?`, [linkedinUrl]);
 543: 
 544:         const normalizedAccountName = normalizeTextValue(input.accountName);
 545:         const normalizedFirstName = normalizeTextValue(input.firstName);
 546:         const normalizedLastName = normalizeTextValue(input.lastName);
 547:         const normalizedJobTitle = normalizeTextValue(input.jobTitle);
 548:         const normalizedWebsite = normalizeTextValue(input.website);
 549: 
 550:         let leadId = 0;
 551:         let action: UpsertSalesNavigatorLeadResult['action'] = 'unchanged';
 552: 
 553:         if (!existing) {
 554:             const insertResult = await db.run(
 555:                 `
 556:                 INSERT INTO leads
 557:                     (account_name, first_name, last_name, job_title, website, linkedin_url, status, list_name, about, experience, invite_prompt_variant, lead_score, confidence_score)
 558:                 VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'NEW', ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, ?, ?)
 559:             `,
 560:                 [
 561:                     normalizedAccountName,
 562:                     normalizedFirstName,
 563:                     normalizedLastName,
 564:                     normalizedJobTitle,
 565:                     normalizedWebsite,
 566:                     linkedinUrl,
 567:                     listName,
 568:                     input.leadScore ?? null,
 569:                     input.confidenceScore ?? null,
 570:                 ]
 571:             );
 572:             leadId = insertResult.lastID ?? 0;
 573:             action = 'inserted';
 574:         } else {
 575:             leadId = existing.id;
 576:             const nextAccountName = mergedLeadValue(existing.account_name, normalizedAccountName);
 577:             const nextFirstName = mergedLeadValue(existing.first_name, normalizedFirstName);
 578:             const nextLastName = mergedLeadValue(existing.last_name, normalizedLastName);
 579:             const nextJobTitle = mergedLeadValue(existing.job_title, normalizedJobTitle);
 580:             const nextWebsite = normalizeTextValue(existing.website)
 581:                 ? existing.website
 582:                 : mergedLeadValue(existing.website, normalizedWebsite);
 583:             const nextListName = listName;
 584: 
 585:             const changed = nextAccountName !== existing.account_name
 586:                 || nextFirstName !== existing.first_name
 587:                 || nextLastName !== existing.last_name
 588:                 || nextJobTitle !== existing.job_title
 589:                 || nextWebsite !== existing.website
 590:                 || nextListName !== existing.list_name;
 591: 
 592:             if (changed) {
 593:                 await db.run(
 594:                     `
 595:                     UPDATE leads
 596:                     SET account_name = ?,
 597:                         first_name = ?,
 598:                         last_name = ?,
 599:                         job_title = ?,
 600:                         website = ?,
 601:                         list_name = ?,
 602:                         updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 603:                     WHERE id = ?
 604:                 `,
 605:                     [
 606:                         nextAccountName,
 607:                         nextFirstName,
 608:                         nextLastName,
 609:                         nextJobTitle,
 610:                         nextWebsite,
 611:                         nextListName,
 612:                         leadId,
 613:                     ]
 614:                 );
 615:                 action = 'updated';
 616:             }
 617:         }
 618: 
 619:         const linkedLead = leadId > 0
 620:             ? { id: leadId }
 621:             : await db.get<{ id: number }>(`SELECT id FROM leads WHERE linkedin_url = ?`, [linkedinUrl]);
 622:         const listRow = await db.get<{ id: number }>(`SELECT id FROM lead_lists WHERE name = ?`, [listName]);
 623:         if (linkedLead?.id && listRow?.id) {
 624:             await db.run(`INSERT OR IGNORE INTO list_leads (list_id, lead_id) VALUES (?, ?)`, [listRow.id, linkedLead.id]);
 625:         }
 626: 
 627:         return {
 628:             leadId: linkedLead?.id ?? leadId,
 629:             action,
 630:         };
 631:     });
 632: }
 633: 
 634: export async function getExpiredInvitedLeads(accountId: string, olderThanDays: number): Promise<LeadRecord[]> {
 635:     const db = await getDatabase();
 636:     return db.all<LeadRecord[]>(
 637:         `SELECT * FROM leads WHERE account_id = ? AND status = 'INVITED' AND invited_at < datetime('now', '-' || ? || ' days') LIMIT 50`,
 638:         [accountId, olderThanDays]
 639:     );
 640: }
 641: 
 642: export async function addCompanyTarget(input: AddCompanyTargetInput): Promise<boolean> {
 643:     const db = await getDatabase();
 644:     await ensureLeadList(input.listName);
 645: 
 646:     const normalizedAccountName = (input.accountName ?? '').trim();
 647:     const normalizedWebsite = (input.website ?? '').trim();
 648:     if (!normalizedAccountName && !normalizedWebsite) {
 649:         return false;
 650:     }
 651: 
 652:     const result = await db.run(
 653:         `
 654:         INSERT OR IGNORE INTO company_targets (list_name, account_name, website, source_file, status)
 655:         VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, 'NEW')
 656:     `,
 657:         [input.listName, normalizedAccountName, normalizedWebsite, input.sourceFile ?? null]
 658:     );
 659:     return (result.changes ?? 0) > 0;
 660: }
 661: 
 662: export async function countCompanyTargets(listName?: string): Promise<number> {
 663:     const db = await getDatabase();
 664:     const row = listName
 665:         ? await db.get<{ total: number }>(
 666:             `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM company_targets WHERE list_name = ?`,
 667:             [listName]
 668:         )
 669:         : await db.get<{ total: number }>(
 670:             `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM company_targets`
 671:         );
 672:     return row?.total ?? 0;
 673: }
 674: 
 675: export async function listCompanyTargets(listName: string | null, limit: number): Promise<CompanyTargetRecord[]> {
 676:     const db = await getDatabase();
 677:     const safeLimit = Math.max(1, limit);
 678:     if (listName) {
 679:         return db.all<CompanyTargetRecord[]>(
 680:             `
 681:             SELECT id, list_name, account_name, website, source_file, status, attempts, last_error, processed_at, created_at, updated_at
 682:             FROM company_targets
 683:             WHERE list_name = ?
 684:             ORDER BY updated_at DESC, created_at DESC
 685:             LIMIT ?
 686:         `,
 687:             [listName, safeLimit]
 688:         );
 689:     }
 690: 
 691:     return db.all<CompanyTargetRecord[]>(
 692:         `
 693:         SELECT id, list_name, account_name, website, source_file, status, attempts, last_error, processed_at, created_at, updated_at
 694:         FROM company_targets
 695:         ORDER BY updated_at DESC, created_at DESC
 696:         LIMIT ?
 697:     `,
 698:         [safeLimit]
 699:     );
 700: }
 701: 
 702: export async function getCompanyTargetsForEnrichment(limit: number): Promise<CompanyTargetRecord[]> {
 703:     const db = await getDatabase();
 704:     const safeLimit = Math.max(1, limit);
 705:     return db.all<CompanyTargetRecord[]>(
 706:         `
 707:         SELECT id, list_name, account_name, website, source_file, status, attempts, last_error, processed_at, created_at, updated_at
 708:         FROM company_targets
 709:         WHERE status IN ('NEW', 'ERROR')
 710:         ORDER BY status DESC, created_at ASC
 711:         LIMIT ?
 712:     `,
 713:         [safeLimit]
 714:     );
 715: }
 716: 
 717: export async function setCompanyTargetStatus(
 718:     targetId: number,
 719:     status: CompanyTargetStatus,
 720:     lastError: string | null = null
 721: ): Promise<void> {
 722:     const db = await getDatabase();
 723:     await db.run(
 724:         `
 725:         UPDATE company_targets
 726:         SET status = ?,
 727:             attempts = attempts + 1,
 728:             last_error = ?,
 729:             processed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 730:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 731:         WHERE id = ?
 732:     `,
 733:         [status, lastError, targetId]
 734:     );
 735: }
 736: 
 737: export async function countCompanyTargetsByStatuses(statuses: CompanyTargetStatus[]): Promise<number> {
 738:     if (statuses.length === 0) return 0;
 739:     const db = await getDatabase();
 740:     const placeholders = statuses.map(() => '?').join(', ');
 741:     const row = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
 742:         `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM company_targets WHERE status IN (${placeholders})`,
 743:         statuses
 744:     );
 745:     return row?.total ?? 0;
 746: }
 747: 
 748: export async function promoteNewLeadsToReadyInvite(limit: number): Promise<number> {
 749:     const db = await getDatabase();
 750:     const leads = await db.all<{ id: number }[]>(
 751:         `SELECT id FROM leads WHERE status = 'NEW' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT ?`,
 752:         [limit]
 753:     );
 754:     if (leads.length === 0) return 0;
 755: 
 756:     const ids = leads.map((lead) => lead.id);
 757:     const placeholders = ids.map(() => '?').join(', ');
 758:     const result = await db.run(
 759:         `UPDATE leads SET status = 'READY_INVITE', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id IN (${placeholders})`,
 760:         ids
 761:     );
 762:     return result.changes ?? 0;
 763: }
 764: 
 765: export async function getLeadById(leadId: number): Promise<LeadRecord | null> {
 766:     const db = await getDatabase();
 767:     const lead = await db.get<LeadRecord>(`SELECT * FROM leads WHERE id = ?`, [leadId]);
 768:     if (!lead) return null;
 769:     lead.status = normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status);
 770:     return lead;
 771: }
 772: 
 773: export async function updateLeadScrapedContext(leadId: number, about: string | null, experience: string | null): Promise<void> {
 774:     const db = await getDatabase();
 775:     await db.run(
 776:         `
 777:         UPDATE leads
 778:         SET about = ?,
 779:             experience = ?,
 780:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 781:         WHERE id = ?
 782:     `,
 783:         [about, experience, leadId]
 784:     );
 785: }
 786: 
 787: export async function updateLeadPromptVariant(leadId: number, variant: string | null): Promise<void> {
 788:     const db = await getDatabase();
 789:     await db.run(
 790:         `
 791:         UPDATE leads
 792:         SET invite_prompt_variant = ?,
 793:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 794:         WHERE id = ?
 795:     `,
 796:         [variant, leadId]
 797:     );
 798: }
 799: 
 800: export async function updateLeadScores(leadId: number, leadScore: number | null, confidenceScore: number | null): Promise<void> {
 801:     const db = await getDatabase();
 802:     await db.run(
 803:         `
 804:         UPDATE leads
 805:         SET lead_score = ?,
 806:             confidence_score = ?,
 807:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 808:         WHERE id = ?
 809:     `,
 810:         [leadScore, confidenceScore, leadId]
 811:     );
 812: }
 813: 
 814: export async function getLeadsWithSalesNavigatorUrls(limit: number): Promise<LeadRecord[]> {
 815:     const db = await getDatabase();
 816:     const safeLimit = Math.max(1, limit);
 817:     const leads = await db.all<LeadRecord[]>(
 818:         `
 819:         SELECT *
 820:         FROM leads
 821:         WHERE linkedin_url LIKE '%linkedin.com/sales/%'
 822:           AND status IN ('NEW', 'READY_INVITE', 'INVITED', 'ACCEPTED', 'READY_MESSAGE', 'BLOCKED', 'PENDING')
 823:         ORDER BY updated_at DESC, created_at ASC
 824:         LIMIT ?
 825:     `,
 826:         [safeLimit]
 827:     );
 828:     return leads.map((lead) => ({ ...lead, status: normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status) }));
 829: }
 830: 
 831: export interface UpdateLeadLinkedinUrlResult {
 832:     updated: boolean;
 833:     conflictLeadId: number | null;
 834: }
 835: 
 836: export async function updateLeadLinkedinUrl(leadId: number, nextLinkedinUrl: string): Promise<UpdateLeadLinkedinUrlResult> {
 837:     const db = await getDatabase();
 838:     const normalizedUrl = normalizeLinkedInUrl(nextLinkedinUrl);
 839: 
 840:     try {
 841:         const result = await db.run(
 842:             `
 843:             UPDATE leads
 844:             SET linkedin_url = ?,
 845:                 updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 846:             WHERE id = ?
 847:         `,
 848:             [normalizedUrl, leadId]
 849:         );
 850:         return {
 851:             updated: (result.changes ?? 0) > 0,
 852:             conflictLeadId: null,
 853:         };
 854:     } catch (error) {
 855:         const message = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
 856:         if (!/UNIQUE constraint failed:\s*leads\.linkedin_url/i.test(message)) {
 857:             throw error;
 858:         }
 859:         const conflict = await db.get<{ id: number }>(
 860:             `SELECT id FROM leads WHERE linkedin_url = ? LIMIT 1`,
 861:             [normalizedUrl]
 862:         );
 863:         return {
 864:             updated: false,
 865:             conflictLeadId: conflict?.id ?? null,
 866:         };
 867:     }
 868: }
 869: 
 870: export async function getLeadsByStatus(status: LeadStatus, limit: number): Promise<LeadRecord[]> {
 871:     const db = await getDatabase();
 872:     const normalized = normalizeLegacyStatus(status);
 873:     const leads = await db.all<LeadRecord[]>(
 874:         `SELECT * FROM leads WHERE status = ? ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT ?`,
 875:         [normalized, limit]
 876:     );
 877:     return leads.map((lead) => ({ ...lead, status: normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status) }));
 878: }
 879: 
 880: export async function getLeadsByStatusForSiteCheck(status: LeadStatus, limit: number, staleDays: number): Promise<LeadRecord[]> {
 881:     const db = await getDatabase();
 882:     const normalized = normalizeLegacyStatus(status);
 883:     const safeLimit = Math.max(1, limit);
 884:     const safeStaleDays = Math.max(0, staleDays);
 885:     const leads = await db.all<LeadRecord[]>(
 886:         `
 887:         SELECT *
 888:         FROM leads
 889:         WHERE status = ?
 890:           AND (
 891:             last_site_check_at IS NULL
 892:             OR last_site_check_at <= DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')
 893:           )
 894:         ORDER BY
 895:             CASE WHEN last_site_check_at IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ASC,
 896:             last_site_check_at ASC,
 897:             created_at ASC
 898:         LIMIT ?
 899:     `,
 900:         [normalized, safeStaleDays, safeLimit]
 901:     );
 902:     return leads.map((lead) => ({ ...lead, status: normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status) }));
 903: }
 904: 
 905: export async function getLeadsByStatusForList(status: LeadStatus, listName: string, limit: number): Promise<LeadRecord[]> {
 906:     const db = await getDatabase();
 907:     const normalized = normalizeLegacyStatus(status);
 908:     const leads = await db.all<LeadRecord[]>(
 909:         `
 910:         SELECT *
 911:         FROM leads
 912:         WHERE status = ?
 913:           AND list_name = ?
 914:         ORDER BY created_at ASC
 915:         LIMIT ?
 916:     `,
 917:         [normalized, listName, limit]
 918:     );
 919:     return leads.map((lead) => ({ ...lead, status: normalizeLegacyStatus(lead.status) }));
 920: }
 921: 
 922: export async function touchLeadSiteCheckAt(leadId: number): Promise<void> {
 923:     const db = await getDatabase();
 924:     await db.run(
 925:         `
 926:         UPDATE leads
 927:         SET last_site_check_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 928:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 929:         WHERE id = ?
 930:     `,
 931:         [leadId]
 932:     );
 933: }
 934: 
 935: export async function countLeadsByStatuses(statuses: LeadStatus[]): Promise<number> {
 936:     if (statuses.length === 0) return 0;
 937:     const db = await getDatabase();
 938:     const normalized = statuses.map((status) => normalizeLegacyStatus(status));
 939:     const placeholders = normalized.map(() => '?').join(', ');
 940:     const row = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
 941:         `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM leads WHERE status IN (${placeholders})`,
 942:         normalized
 943:     );
 944:     return row?.total ?? 0;
 945: }
 946: 
 947: export async function getLeadStatusCountsForLists(listNames: string[]): Promise<ListLeadStatusCount[]> {
 948:     if (listNames.length === 0) {
 949:         return [];
 950:     }
 951: 
 952:     const db = await getDatabase();
 953:     const placeholders = listNames.map(() => '?').join(', ');
 954:     return db.all<ListLeadStatusCount[]>(
 955:         `
 956:         SELECT list_name, status, COUNT(*) as total
 957:         FROM leads
 958:         WHERE list_name IN (${placeholders})
 959:         GROUP BY list_name, status
 960:     `,
 961:         listNames
 962:     );
 963: }
 964: 
 965: export async function setLeadStatus(leadId: number, status: LeadStatus, errorMessage?: string, blockedReason?: string): Promise<void> {
 966:     const db = await getDatabase();
 967:     const normalized = normalizeLegacyStatus(status);
 968:     const timestampColumn = normalized === 'INVITED' ? 'invited_at' : normalized === 'ACCEPTED' ? 'accepted_at' : normalized === 'MESSAGED' ? 'messaged_at' : null;
 969: 
 970:     if (timestampColumn) {
 971:         await db.run(
 972:             `
 973:             UPDATE leads
 974:             SET status = ?, ${timestampColumn} = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_error = ?, blocked_reason = ?, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 975:             WHERE id = ?
 976:         `,
 977:             [normalized, errorMessage ?? null, blockedReason ?? null, leadId]
 978:         );
 979:         return;
 980:     }
 981: 
 982:     await db.run(
 983:         `
 984:         UPDATE leads
 985:         SET status = ?, last_error = ?, blocked_reason = ?, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 986:         WHERE id = ?
 987:     `,
 988:         [normalized, errorMessage ?? null, blockedReason ?? null, leadId]
 989:     );
 990: }
 991: 
 992: export async function appendLeadEvent(
 993:     leadId: number,
 994:     fromStatus: LeadStatus,
 995:     toStatus: LeadStatus,
 996:     reason: string,
 997:     metadata: Record<string, unknown>
 998: ): Promise<void> {
 999:     const db = await getDatabase();
1000:     await db.run(
1001:         `
1002:         INSERT INTO lead_events (lead_id, from_status, to_status, reason, metadata_json)
1003:         VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
1004:     `,
1005:         [leadId, normalizeLegacyStatus(fromStatus), normalizeLegacyStatus(toStatus), reason, JSON.stringify(metadata)]
1006:     );
1007: }
1008: 
1009: export async function getDailyStat(dateString: string, field: 'invites_sent' | 'messages_sent' | 'challenges_count' | 'selector_failures' | 'run_errors'): Promise<number> {
1010:     const db = await getDatabase();
1011:     const row = await db.get<Record<string, number>>(
1012:         `SELECT ${field} FROM daily_stats WHERE date = ?`,
1013:         [dateString]
1014:     );
1015:     return row?.[field] ?? 0;
1016: }
1017: 
1018: export async function getDailyStatsSnapshot(dateString: string): Promise<DailyStatsSnapshot> {
1019:     const db = await getDatabase();
1020:     const row = await db.get<{
1021:         invites_sent: number;
1022:         messages_sent: number;
1023:         challenges_count: number;
1024:         selector_failures: number;
1025:         run_errors: number;
1026:     }>(
1027:         `SELECT invites_sent, messages_sent, challenges_count, selector_failures, run_errors FROM daily_stats WHERE date = ?`,
1028:         [dateString]
1029:     );
1030: 
1031:     return {
1032:         date: dateString,
1033:         invitesSent: row?.invites_sent ?? 0,
1034:         messagesSent: row?.messages_sent ?? 0,
1035:         challengesCount: row?.challenges_count ?? 0,
1036:         selectorFailures: row?.selector_failures ?? 0,
1037:         runErrors: row?.run_errors ?? 0,
1038:     };
1039: }
1040: 
1041: export async function getListDailyStat(
1042:     dateString: string,
1043:     listName: string,
1044:     field: 'invites_sent' | 'messages_sent'
1045: ): Promise<number> {
1046:     const db = await getDatabase();
1047:     const row = await db.get<Record<string, number>>(
1048:         `SELECT ${field} FROM list_daily_stats WHERE date = ? AND list_name = ?`,
1049:         [dateString, listName]
1050:     );
1051:     return row?.[field] ?? 0;
1052: }
1053: 
1054: export async function incrementDailyStat(
1055:     dateString: string,
1056:     field: 'invites_sent' | 'messages_sent' | 'acceptances' | 'challenges_count' | 'selector_failures' | 'run_errors',
1057:     amount: number = 1
1058: ): Promise<void> {
1059:     const db = await getDatabase();
1060:     await db.run(
1061:         `
1062:         INSERT INTO daily_stats (date, ${field}) VALUES (?, ?)
1063:         ON CONFLICT(date) DO UPDATE SET ${field} = ${field} + ?
1064:     `,
1065:         [dateString, amount, amount]
1066:     );
1067: }
1068: 
1069: export async function incrementListDailyStat(
1070:     dateString: string,
1071:     listName: string,
1072:     field: 'invites_sent' | 'messages_sent',
1073:     amount: number = 1
1074: ): Promise<void> {
1075:     const db = await getDatabase();
1076:     await db.run(
1077:         `
1078:         INSERT INTO list_daily_stats (date, list_name, ${field}) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
1079:         ON CONFLICT(date, list_name) DO UPDATE SET ${field} = ${field} + ?
1080:     `,
1081:         [dateString, listName, amount, amount]
1082:     );
1083: }
1084: 
1085: export async function countWeeklyInvites(weekStartDate: string): Promise<number> {
1086:     const db = await getDatabase();
1087:     const row = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
1088:         `SELECT COALESCE(SUM(invites_sent), 0) as total FROM daily_stats WHERE date >= ?`,
1089:         [weekStartDate]
1090:     );
1091:     return row?.total ?? 0;
1092: }
1093: 
1094: export async function enqueueJob(
1095:     type: JobType,
1096:     payload: Record<string, unknown>,
1097:     idempotencyKey: string,
1098:     priority: number,
1099:     maxAttempts: number,
1100:     initialDelaySeconds: number = 0,
1101:     accountId: string = 'default'
1102: ): Promise<boolean> {
1103:     const db = await getDatabase();
1104:     const safeDelay = Math.max(0, Math.floor(initialDelaySeconds));
1105:     const normalizedAccountId = accountId.trim() || 'default';
1106:     const result = await db.run(
1107:         `
1108:         INSERT OR IGNORE INTO jobs (type, status, account_id, payload_json, idempotency_key, priority, max_attempts, next_run_at)
1109:         VALUES (?, 'QUEUED', ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'))
1110:     `,
1111:         [type, normalizedAccountId, JSON.stringify(payload), idempotencyKey, priority, maxAttempts, safeDelay]
1112:     );
1113:     return (result.changes ?? 0) > 0;
1114: }
1115: 
1116: export async function lockNextQueuedJob(
1117:     allowedTypes: JobType[],
1118:     accountId?: string,
1119:     includeLegacyDefaultQueue: boolean = false
1120: ): Promise<JobRecord | null> {
1121:     if (allowedTypes.length === 0) {
1122:         return null;
1123:     }
1124:     const db = await getDatabase();
1125:     return withTransaction(db, async () => {
1126:         const placeholders = allowedTypes.map(() => '?').join(', ');
1127:         const whereClauses = [
1128:             `status = 'QUEUED'`,
1129:             `next_run_at <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP`,
1130:             `type IN (${placeholders})`,
1131:         ];
1132:         const params: unknown[] = [...allowedTypes];
1133: 
1134:         const normalizedAccountId = accountId?.trim();
1135:         if (normalizedAccountId) {
1136:             if (includeLegacyDefaultQueue && normalizedAccountId !== 'default') {
1137:                 whereClauses.push(`account_id IN (?, 'default')`);
1138:                 params.push(normalizedAccountId);
1139:             } else {
1140:                 whereClauses.push(`account_id = ?`);
1141:                 params.push(normalizedAccountId);
1142:             }
1143:         }
1144: 
1145:         const job = await db.get<JobRecord>(
1146:             `
1147:             SELECT * FROM jobs
1148:             WHERE ${whereClauses.join('\n              AND ')}
1149:             ORDER BY priority ASC, created_at ASC
1150:             LIMIT 1
1151:         `,
1152:             params
1153:         );
1154: 
1155:         if (!job) return null;
1156: 
1157:         const updateResult = await db.run(
1158:             `
1159:             UPDATE jobs
1160:             SET status = 'RUNNING', locked_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1161:             WHERE id = ? AND status = 'QUEUED'
1162:         `,
1163:             [job.id]
1164:         );
1165:         if ((updateResult.changes ?? 0) === 0) {
1166:             return null;
1167:         }
1168: 
1169:         return {
1170:             ...job,
1171:             status: 'RUNNING',
1172:             payload_json: job.payload_json,
1173:         };
1174:     });
1175: }
1176: 
1177: export async function markJobSucceeded(jobId: number): Promise<void> {
1178:     const db = await getDatabase();
1179:     await db.run(
1180:         `
1181:         UPDATE jobs
1182:         SET status = 'SUCCEEDED', locked_at = NULL, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1183:         WHERE id = ?
1184:     `,
1185:         [jobId]
1186:     );
1187: }
1188: 
1189: export async function markJobRetryOrDeadLetter(
1190:     jobId: number,
1191:     attempts: number,
1192:     maxAttempts: number,
1193:     nextRetryDelayMs: number,
1194:     errorMessage: string
1195: ): Promise<JobStatus> {
1196:     const db = await getDatabase();
1197:     if (attempts >= maxAttempts) {
1198:         await db.run(
1199:             `
1200:             UPDATE jobs
1201:             SET status = 'DEAD_LETTER',
1202:                 attempts = ?,
1203:                 last_error = ?,
1204:                 locked_at = NULL,
1205:                 updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1206:             WHERE id = ?
1207:         `,
1208:             [attempts, errorMessage, jobId]
1209:         );
1210:         return 'DEAD_LETTER';
1211:     }
1212: 
1213:     const seconds = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(nextRetryDelayMs / 1000));
1214:     await db.run(
1215:         `
1216:         UPDATE jobs
1217:         SET status = 'QUEUED',
1218:             attempts = ?,
1219:             last_error = ?,
1220:             next_run_at = DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'),
1221:             locked_at = NULL,
1222:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1223:         WHERE id = ?
1224:     `,
1225:         [attempts, errorMessage, seconds, jobId]
1226:     );
1227:     return 'QUEUED';
1228: }
1229: 
1230: export async function createJobAttempt(
1231:     jobId: number,
1232:     success: boolean,
1233:     errorCode: string | null,
1234:     errorMessage: string | null,
1235:     evidencePath: string | null
1236: ): Promise<void> {
1237:     const db = await getDatabase();
1238:     await db.run(
1239:         `
1240:         INSERT INTO job_attempts (job_id, finished_at, success, error_code, error_message, evidence_path)
1241:         VALUES (?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ?, ?, ?, ?)
1242:     `,
1243:         [jobId, success ? 1 : 0, errorCode, errorMessage, evidencePath]
1244:     );
1245: }
1246: 
1247: export async function createIncident(
1248:     type: string,
1249:     severity: 'INFO' | 'WARN' | 'CRITICAL',
1250:     details: Record<string, unknown>
1251: ): Promise<number> {
1252:     const db = await getDatabase();
1253:     const result = await db.run(
1254:         `
1255:         INSERT INTO account_incidents (type, severity, status, details_json)
1256:         VALUES (?, ?, 'OPEN', ?)
1257:     `,
1258:         [type, severity, JSON.stringify(details)]
1259:     );
1260:     return result.lastID ?? 0;
1261: }
1262: 
1263: export async function listOpenIncidents(): Promise<Array<{ id: number; type: string; severity: string; opened_at: string }>> {
1264:     const db = await getDatabase();
1265:     return db.all(`SELECT id, type, severity, opened_at FROM account_incidents WHERE status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY opened_at DESC`);
1266: }
1267: 
1268: export async function resolveIncident(incidentId: number): Promise<void> {
1269:     const db = await getDatabase();
1270:     await db.run(
1271:         `
1272:         UPDATE account_incidents
1273:         SET status = 'RESOLVED', resolved_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1274:         WHERE id = ?
1275:     `,
1276:         [incidentId]
1277:     );
1278: }
1279: 
1280: export async function pushOutboxEvent(topic: string, payload: Record<string, unknown>, idempotencyKey: string): Promise<void> {
1281:     const db = await getDatabase();
1282:     await db.run(
1283:         `
1284:         INSERT OR IGNORE INTO outbox_events (topic, payload_json, idempotency_key)
1285:         VALUES (?, ?, ?)
1286:     `,
1287:         [topic, JSON.stringify(payload), idempotencyKey]
1288:     );
1289: }
1290: 
1291: export async function getPendingOutboxEvents(limit: number): Promise<OutboxEventRecord[]> {
1292:     const db = await getDatabase();
1293:     return db.all<OutboxEventRecord[]>(
1294:         `
1295:         SELECT * FROM outbox_events
1296:         WHERE delivered_at IS NULL
1297:           AND next_retry_at <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1298:         ORDER BY created_at ASC
1299:         LIMIT ?
1300:     `,
1301:         [limit]
1302:     );
1303: }
1304: 
1305: export async function markOutboxDelivered(eventId: number): Promise<void> {
1306:     const db = await getDatabase();
1307:     await db.run(
1308:         `
1309:         UPDATE outbox_events
1310:         SET delivered_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1311:             last_error = NULL
1312:         WHERE id = ?
1313:     `,
1314:         [eventId]
1315:     );
1316: }
1317: 
1318: export async function markOutboxRetry(eventId: number, attempts: number, retryDelayMs: number, errorMessage: string): Promise<void> {
1319:     const db = await getDatabase();
1320:     const seconds = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(retryDelayMs / 1000));
1321:     await db.run(
1322:         `
1323:         UPDATE outbox_events
1324:         SET attempts = ?,
1325:             next_retry_at = DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'),
1326:             last_error = ?
1327:         WHERE id = ?
1328:     `,
1329:         [attempts, seconds, errorMessage, eventId]
1330:     );
1331: }
1332: 
1333: export async function markOutboxPermanentFailure(eventId: number, attempts: number, errorMessage: string): Promise<void> {
1334:     const db = await getDatabase();
1335:     await db.run(
1336:         `
1337:         UPDATE outbox_events
1338:         SET attempts = ?,
1339:             delivered_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1340:             last_error = ?
1341:         WHERE id = ?
1342:     `,
1343:         [attempts, `PERMANENT_FAILURE: ${errorMessage}`, eventId]
1344:     );
1345: }
1346: 
1347: export async function countPendingOutboxEvents(): Promise<number> {
1348:     const db = await getDatabase();
1349:     const row = await db.get<{ total: number }>(`SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM outbox_events WHERE delivered_at IS NULL`);
1350:     return row?.total ?? 0;
1351: }
1352: 
1353: export async function getJobStatusCounts(): Promise<JobStatusCounts> {
1354:     const db = await getDatabase();
1355:     const rows = await db.all<{ status: JobStatus; total: number }[]>(
1356:         `SELECT status, COUNT(*) as total FROM jobs GROUP BY status`
1357:     );
1358: 
1359:     const counts: JobStatusCounts = {
1360:         QUEUED: 0,
1361:         RUNNING: 0,
1362:         SUCCEEDED: 0,
1363:         FAILED: 0,
1364:         DEAD_LETTER: 0,
1365:         PAUSED: 0,
1366:     };
1367: 
1368:     for (const row of rows) {
1369:         if (row.status in counts) {
1370:             counts[row.status] = row.total;
1371:         }
1372:     }
1373: 
1374:     return counts;
1375: }
1376: 
1377: export async function getRuntimeLock(lockKey: string): Promise<RuntimeLockRecord | null> {
1378:     const db = await getDatabase();
1379:     const row = await db.get<RuntimeLockRecord>(`SELECT * FROM runtime_locks WHERE lock_key = ?`, [lockKey]);
1380:     return row ?? null;
1381: }
1382: 
1383: export async function acquireRuntimeLock(
1384:     lockKey: string,
1385:     ownerId: string,
1386:     ttlSeconds: number,
1387:     metadata: Record<string, unknown> = {}
1388: ): Promise<AcquireRuntimeLockResult> {
1389:     const db = await getDatabase();
1390:     const safeTtl = Math.max(1, ttlSeconds);
1391:     const metadataJson = JSON.stringify(metadata);
1392: 
1393:     return withTransaction(db, async () => {
1394:         const existing = await db.get<RuntimeLockRecord>(
1395:             `SELECT * FROM runtime_locks WHERE lock_key = ?`,
1396:             [lockKey]
1397:         );
1398: 
1399:         if (!existing) {
1400:             await db.run(
1401:                 `
1402:                 INSERT INTO runtime_locks (lock_key, owner_id, metadata_json, expires_at)
1403:                 VALUES (?, ?, ?, DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'))
1404:             `,
1405:                 [lockKey, ownerId, metadataJson, safeTtl]
1406:             );
1407:             const inserted = await db.get<RuntimeLockRecord>(`SELECT * FROM runtime_locks WHERE lock_key = ?`, [lockKey]);
1408:             return {
1409:                 acquired: true,
1410:                 lock: inserted ?? null,
1411:             };
1412:         }
1413: 
1414:         if (existing.owner_id === ownerId) {
1415:             await db.run(
1416:                 `
1417:                 UPDATE runtime_locks
1418:                 SET heartbeat_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1419:                     expires_at = DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'),
1420:                     metadata_json = ?,
1421:                     updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1422:                 WHERE lock_key = ?
1423:             `,
1424:                 [safeTtl, metadataJson, lockKey]
1425:             );
1426:             const renewed = await db.get<RuntimeLockRecord>(`SELECT * FROM runtime_locks WHERE lock_key = ?`, [lockKey]);
1427:             return {
1428:                 acquired: true,
1429:                 lock: renewed ?? null,
1430:             };
1431:         }
1432: 
1433:         const isStaleRow = await db.get<{ stale: number }>(
1434:             `
1435:             SELECT CASE WHEN expires_at <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS stale
1436:             FROM runtime_locks
1437:             WHERE lock_key = ?
1438:         `,
1439:             [lockKey]
1440:         );
1441: 
1442:         if ((isStaleRow?.stale ?? 0) === 1) {
1443:             await db.run(
1444:                 `
1445:                 UPDATE runtime_locks
1446:                 SET owner_id = ?,
1447:                     acquired_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1448:                     heartbeat_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1449:                     expires_at = DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'),
1450:                     metadata_json = ?,
1451:                     updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1452:                 WHERE lock_key = ?
1453:             `,
1454:                 [ownerId, safeTtl, metadataJson, lockKey]
1455:             );
1456:             const takenOver = await db.get<RuntimeLockRecord>(`SELECT * FROM runtime_locks WHERE lock_key = ?`, [lockKey]);
1457:             return {
1458:                 acquired: true,
1459:                 lock: takenOver ?? null,
1460:             };
1461:         }
1462: 
1463:         return {
1464:             acquired: false,
1465:             lock: existing,
1466:         };
1467:     });
1468: }
1469: 
1470: export async function heartbeatRuntimeLock(lockKey: string, ownerId: string, ttlSeconds: number): Promise<boolean> {
1471:     const db = await getDatabase();
1472:     const safeTtl = Math.max(1, ttlSeconds);
1473:     const result = await db.run(
1474:         `
1475:         UPDATE runtime_locks
1476:         SET heartbeat_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1477:             expires_at = DATETIME('now', '+' || ? || ' seconds'),
1478:             updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1479:         WHERE lock_key = ?
1480:           AND owner_id = ?
1481:     `,
1482:         [safeTtl, lockKey, ownerId]
1483:     );
1484:     return (result.changes ?? 0) > 0;
1485: }
1486: 
1487: export async function releaseRuntimeLock(lockKey: string, ownerId: string): Promise<boolean> {
1488:     const db = await getDatabase();
1489:     const result = await db.run(
1490:         `
1491:         DELETE FROM runtime_locks
1492:         WHERE lock_key = ?
1493:           AND owner_id = ?
1494:     `,
1495:         [lockKey, ownerId]
1496:     );
1497:     return (result.changes ?? 0) > 0;
1498: }
1499: 
1500: export async function setRuntimeFlag(key: string, value: string): Promise<void> {
1501:     const db = await getDatabase();
1502:     await db.run(
1503:         `
1504:         INSERT INTO sync_state (key, value, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
1505:         ON CONFLICT(key) DO UPDATE SET value = excluded.value, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
1506:     `,
1507:         [key, value]
1508:     );
1509: }
1510: 
1511: export async function getRuntimeFlag(key: string): Promise<string | null> {
1512:     const db = await getDatabase();
1513:     const row = await db.get<{ value: string }>(`SELECT value FROM sync_state WHERE key = ?`, [key]);
1514:     return row?.value ?? null;
1515: }
1516: 
1517: export async function setAutomationPause(minutes: number | null, reason: string): Promise<string | null> {
1518:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_paused', 'true');
1519:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_pause_reason', reason.trim() || 'manual_pause');
1520: 
1521:     if (minutes === null) {
1522:         await setRuntimeFlag('automation_paused_until', '');
1523:         return null;
1524:     }
1525: 
1526:     const safeMinutes = Math.max(1, minutes);
1527:     const until = new Date(Date.now() + safeMinutes * 60_000).toISOString();
1528:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_paused_until', until);
1529:     return until;
1530: }
1531: 
1532: export async function clearAutomationPause(): Promise<void> {
1533:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_paused', 'false');
1534:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_paused_until', '');
1535:     await setRuntimeFlag('automation_pause_reason', '');
1536: }
1537: 
1538: export async function getAutomationPauseState(now: Date = new Date()): Promise<AutomationPauseState> {
1539:     const paused = (await getRuntimeFlag('automation_paused')) === 'true';
1540:     if (!paused) {
1541:         return {
1542:             paused: false,
1543:             pausedUntil: null,
1544:             reason: null,
1545:             remainingSeconds: null,
1546:         };
1547:     }
1548: 
1549:     const reasonRaw = await getRuntimeFlag('automation_pause_reason');
1550:     const untilRaw = await getRuntimeFlag('automation_paused_until');
1551:     const parsedUntil = untilRaw && Number.isFinite(Date.parse(untilRaw))
1552:         ? new Date(untilRaw).toISOString()
1553:         : null;
1554: 
1555:     if (parsedUntil && Date.parse(parsedUntil) <= now.getTime()) {
1556:         await clearAutomationPause();
1557:         return {
1558:             paused: false,
1559:             pausedUntil: null,
1560:             reason: null,
1561:             remainingSeconds: null,
1562:         };
1563:     }
1564: 
1565:     const remainingSeconds = parsedUntil
1566:         ? Math.max(0, Math.ceil((Date.parse(parsedUntil) - now.getTime()) / 1000))
1567:         : null;
1568: 
1569:     return {
1570:         paused: true,
1571:         pausedUntil: parsedUntil,
1572:         reason: reasonRaw && reasonRaw.trim() ? reasonRaw : null,
1573:         remainingSeconds,
1574:     };
1575: }
1576: 
1577: export async function recordRunLog(level: 'INFO' | 'WARN' | 'ERROR', event: string, payload: Record<string, unknown>): Promise<void> {
1578:     const db = await getDatabase();
1579:     await db.run(
1580:         `
1581:         INSERT INTO run_logs (level, event, payload_json)
1582:         VALUES (?, ?, ?)
1583:     `,
1584:         [level, event, JSON.stringify(payload)]
1585:     );
1586: }
1587: 
1588: export async function getLastRunLogs(limit: number): Promise<Array<{ level: string; event: string; payload_json: string; created_at: string }>> {
1589:     const db = await getDatabase();
1590:     return db.all(
1591:         `SELECT level, event, payload_json, created_at FROM run_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT ?`,
1592:         [limit]
1593:     );
1594: }
1595: 
1596: export async function cleanupPrivacyData(retentionDays: number): Promise<PrivacyCleanupStats> {
1597:     const db = await getDatabase();
1598:     const safeDays = Math.max(7, retentionDays);
1599:     const daysParam = String(safeDays);
1600: 
1601:     const runLogs = await db.run(
1602:         `DELETE FROM run_logs WHERE created_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1603:         [daysParam]
1604:     );
1605:     const jobAttempts = await db.run(
1606:         `DELETE FROM job_attempts WHERE started_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1607:         [daysParam]
1608:     );
1609:     const leadEvents = await db.run(
1610:         `DELETE FROM lead_events WHERE created_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1611:         [daysParam]
1612:     );
1613:     const messageHistory = await db.run(
1614:         `DELETE FROM message_history WHERE sent_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1615:         [daysParam]
1616:     );
1617:     const deliveredOutboxEvents = await db.run(
1618:         `DELETE FROM outbox_events
1619:          WHERE delivered_at IS NOT NULL
1620:            AND created_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1621:         [daysParam]
1622:     );
1623:     const resolvedIncidents = await db.run(
1624:         `DELETE FROM account_incidents
1625:          WHERE status = 'RESOLVED'
1626:            AND resolved_at < DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' days')`,
1627:         [daysParam]
1628:     );
1629: 
1630:     return {
1631:         runLogs: runLogs.changes ?? 0,
1632:         jobAttempts: jobAttempts.changes ?? 0,
1633:         leadEvents: leadEvents.changes ?? 0,
1634:         messageHistory: messageHistory.changes ?? 0,
1635:         deliveredOutboxEvents: deliveredOutboxEvents.changes ?? 0,
1636:         resolvedIncidents: resolvedIncidents.changes ?? 0,
1637:     };
1638: }
1639: 
1640: export async function storeMessageHash(leadId: number, contentHash: string): Promise<void> {
1641:     const db = await getDatabase();
1642:     await db.run(
1643:         `
1644:         INSERT INTO message_history (lead_id, content_hash)
1645:         VALUES (?, ?)
1646:     `,
1647:         [leadId, contentHash]
1648:     );
1649: }
1650: 
1651: export async function countRecentMessageHash(contentHash: string, hoursWindow: number): Promise<number> {
1652:     const db = await getDatabase();
1653:     const row = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
1654:         `
1655:         SELECT COUNT(*) as total
1656:         FROM message_history
1657:         WHERE content_hash = ?
1658:           AND sent_at >= DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' hours')
1659:     `,
1660:         [contentHash, hoursWindow]
1661:     );
1662:     return row?.total ?? 0;
1663: }
1664: 
1665: export async function getRiskInputs(localDate: string, hardInviteCap: number): Promise<RiskInputs> {
1666:     const db = await getDatabase();
1667:     const pendingInvites = await countLeadsByStatuses(['INVITED']);
1668:     const invitedTotalRow = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
1669:         `SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM leads WHERE invited_at IS NOT NULL`
1670:     );
1671:     const invitedTotal = invitedTotalRow?.total ?? 0;
1672:     const pendingRatio = invitedTotal > 0 ? pendingInvites / invitedTotal : 0;
1673: 
1674:     const attemptsRow = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
1675:         `
1676:         SELECT COUNT(*) as total
1677:         FROM job_attempts
1678:         WHERE started_at >= DATETIME('now', '-24 hours')
1679:     `
1680:     );
1681:     const failedRow = await db.get<{ total: number }>(
1682:         `
1683:         SELECT COUNT(*) as total
1684:         FROM job_attempts
1685:         WHERE started_at >= DATETIME('now', '-24 hours')
1686:           AND success = 0
1687:     `
1688:     );
1689:     const totalAttempts = attemptsRow?.total ?? 0;
1690:     const failedAttempts = failedRow?.total ?? 0;
1691:     const errorRate = totalAttempts > 0 ? failedAttempts / totalAttempts : 0;
1692: 
1693:     const selectorFailures = await getDailyStat(localDate, 'selector_failures');
1694:     const denominator = Math.max(1, totalAttempts);
1695:     const selectorFailureRate = selectorFailures / denominator;
1696: 
1697:     const challengeCount = await getDailyStat(localDate, 'challenges_count');
1698:     const invitesSent = await getDailyStat(localDate, 'invites_sent');
1699:     const inviteVelocityRatio = hardInviteCap > 0 ? invitesSent / hardInviteCap : 0;
1700: 
1701:     return {
1702:         pendingRatio,
1703:         errorRate,
1704:         selectorFailureRate,
1705:         challengeCount,
1706:         inviteVelocityRatio,
1707:     };
1708: }
1709: 
1710: export interface JobWithPayload<T extends Record<string, unknown>> extends JobRecord {
1711:     payload: T;
1712: }
1713: 
1714: export function parseJobPayload<T extends Record<string, unknown>>(job: JobRecord): JobWithPayload<T> {
1715:     return {
1716:         ...job,
1717:         payload: parsePayload<T>(job.payload_json),
1718:     };
1719: }
1720: 
1721: 
1722: /**
1723:  * Al boot, resetta i job RUNNING bloccati da troppo tempo.
1724:  * Un job resta RUNNING se il processo viene killato durante l'esecuzione.
1725:  */
1726: export async function recoverStuckJobs(staleAfterMinutes: number = 30): Promise<number> {
1727:     const db = await getDatabase();
1728:     const result = await db.run(
1729:         `UPDATE jobs
1730:          SET status = 'QUEUED',
1731:              locked_at = NULL,
1732:              updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
1733:              last_error = 'Recovered from RUNNING on startup'
1734:          WHERE status = 'RUNNING'
1735:            AND (
1736:              locked_at IS NULL
1737:              OR locked_at <= DATETIME('now', '-' || ? || ' minutes')
1738:            )`,
1739:         [Math.max(1, staleAfterMinutes)]
1740:     );
1741:     return result.changes ?? 0;
1742: }
1743: 
1744: // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
1745: // Downsync (Cloud -> Local) Application
1746: // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
1747: 
1748: export async function applyCloudAccountUpdates(updates: CloudAccount[]): Promise<void> {
1749:     if (updates.length === 0) return;
1750:     const db = await getDatabase();
1751:     await withTransaction(db, async () => {
1752:         for (const acc of updates) {
1753:             await db.run(
1754:                 `
1755:                 UPDATE accounts
1756:                 SET
1757:                     tier = COALESCE(?, tier),
1758:                     health = COALESCE(?, health),
1759:                     quarantine_reason = COALESCE(?, quarantine_reason),
1760:                     quarantine_until = COALESCE(?, quarantine_until),
1761:                     updated_at = COALESCE(?, updated_at)
1762:                 WHERE id = ?
1763:                 `,
1764:                 [
1765:                     acc.tier,
1766:                     acc.health,
1767:                     acc.quarantine_reason,
1768:                     acc.quarantine_until,
1769:                     acc.updated_at || new Date().toISOString(),
1770:                     acc.id
1771:                 ]
1772:             );
1773:         }
1774:     });
1775: }
1776: 
1777: export async function applyCloudLeadUpdates(updates: CloudLeadUpsert[]): Promise<void> {
1778:     if (updates.length === 0) return;
1779:     const db = await getDatabase();
1780:     await withTransaction(db, async () => {
1781:         for (const l of updates) {
1782:             await db.run(
1783:                 `
1784:                 UPDATE leads
1785:                 SET
1786:                     status = COALESCE(?, status),
1787:                     invited_at = COALESCE(?, invited_at),
1788:                     accepted_at = COALESCE(?, accepted_at),
1789:                     messaged_at = COALESCE(?, messaged_at),
1790:                     last_error = COALESCE(?, last_error),
1791:                     blocked_reason = COALESCE(?, blocked_reason),
1792:                     lead_score = COALESCE(?, lead_score),
1793:                     confidence_score = COALESCE(?, confidence_score),
1794:                     updated_at = COALESCE(?, updated_at)
1795:                 WHERE linkedin_url = ?
1796:                 `,
1797:                 [
1798:                     l.status,
1799:                     l.invited_at,
1800:                     l.accepted_at,
1801:                     l.messaged_at,
1802:                     l.last_error,
1803:                     l.blocked_reason,
1804:                     l.lead_score,
1805:                     l.confidence_score,
1806:                     l.updated_at || new Date().toISOString(),
1807:                     l.linkedin_url
1808:                 ]
1809:             );
1810:         }
1811:     });
1812: }
1813: 
1814: // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
1815: // KPI Analytics
1816: // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
1817: 
1818: export interface GlobalKPIData {
1819:     totalLeads: number;
1820:     statusCounts: Record<string, number>;
1821:     activeCampaigns: number;
1822:     totalAcceptances7d: number;
1823: }
1824: 
1825: export async function getGlobalKPIData(): Promise<GlobalKPIData> {
1826:     const db = await getDatabase();
1827: 
1828:     // Status counts
1829:     const counts = await db.all(`
1830:         SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM leads GROUP BY status
1831:     `) as Array<{ status: string; count: number }>;
1832: 
1833:     let totalLeads = 0;
1834:     const statusCounts: Record<string, number> = {};
1835:     for (const row of counts) {
1836:         statusCounts[row.status] = row.count;
1837:         totalLeads += row.count;
1838:     }
1839: 
1840:     // Active campaigns
1841:     const activeCamps = await db.get(`
1842:         SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM lead_lists WHERE is_active = 1
1843:     `) as { count: number } | undefined;
1844: 
1845:     // Acceptances in last 7 days from daily_stats
1846:     const weeklyAcceptancesRow = await db.get(`
1847:         SELECT SUM(acceptances) as count 
1848:         FROM daily_stats 
1849:         WHERE date >= date('now', '-7 days')
1850:     `) as { count: number } | undefined;
1851: 
1852:     return {
1853:         totalLeads,
1854:         statusCounts,
1855:         activeCampaigns: activeCamps?.count ?? 0,
1856:         totalAcceptances7d: weeklyAcceptancesRow?.count ?? 0
1857:     };
1858: }
1859: 
1860: export async function startCampaignRun(): Promise<number> {
1861:     const db = await getDatabase();
1862:     const result = await db.run(`
1863:         INSERT INTO campaign_runs (start_time, status)
1864:         VALUES (strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%f', 'now'), 'RUNNING')
1865:     `);
1866:     if (!result.lastID) {
1867:         throw new Error('Failed to create campaign run record');
1868:     }
1869:     return result.lastID;
1870: }
1871: 
1872: export interface CampaignRunMetrics {
1873:     discovered: number;
1874:     invites: number;
1875:     messages: number;
1876:     errors: number;
1877: }
1878: 
1879: export async function finishCampaignRun(runId: number, status: RunStatus, metrics: CampaignRunMetrics): Promise<void> {
1880:     const db = await getDatabase();
1881:     await db.run(
1882:         `
1883:         UPDATE campaign_runs
1884:         SET 
1885:             end_time = strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%f', 'now'),
1886:             status = ?,
1887:             profiles_discovered = ?,
1888:             invites_sent = ?,
1889:             messages_sent = ?,
1890:             errors_count = ?
1891:         WHERE id = ?
1892:     `,
1893:         [status, metrics.discovered, metrics.invites, metrics.messages, metrics.errors, runId]
1894:     );
1895: }
1896: 
1897: export async function getABTestingStats(): Promise<ABTestStats[]> {
1898:     const db = await getDatabase();
1899: 
1900:     // Group by invite_prompt_variant where status > INVITED
1901:     // Count total as totalSent
1902:     // Count ACCEPTED + READY_MESSAGE + MESSAGED + REPLIED + CONNECTED as accepted
1903:     // Count REPLIED as replied
1904:     const rows = await db.all<{ variant: string, totalSent: number, totalAccepted: number, totalReplied: number }[]>(`
1905:         SELECT 
1906:             COALESCE(invite_prompt_variant, 'default') as variant,
1907:             COUNT(id) as totalSent,
1908:             SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('ACCEPTED', 'READY_MESSAGE', 'MESSAGED', 'REPLIED', 'CONNECTED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as totalAccepted,
1909:             SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('REPLIED', 'CONNECTED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as totalReplied
1910:         FROM leads
1911:         WHERE status NOT IN ('NEW', 'READY_INVITE', 'REVIEW_REQUIRED', 'SKIPPED', 'BLOCKED', 'DEAD', 'WITHDRAWN', 'PENDING')
1912:           AND invite_prompt_variant IS NOT NULL
1913:         GROUP BY COALESCE(invite_prompt_variant, 'default')
1914:         ORDER BY totalSent DESC
1915:     `);
1916: 
1917:     return rows.map(r => {
1918:         const totalSent = r.totalSent || 0;
1919:         const totalAccepted = r.totalAccepted || 0;
1920:         const totalReplied = r.totalReplied || 0;
1921: 
1922:         return {
1923:             variant: r.variant,
1924:             totalSent,
1925:             totalAccepted,
1926:             totalReplied,
1927:             acceptanceRate: totalSent > 0 ? (totalAccepted / totalSent) * 100 : 0,
1928:             replyRate: totalSent > 0 ? (totalReplied / totalSent) * 100 : 0
1929:         };
1930:     });
1931: }
````

## File: src/index.ts
````typescript
   1: import { closeDatabase, initDatabase, backupDatabase } from './db';
   2: import { config, getLocalDateString } from './config';
   3: import { checkLogin, closeBrowser as closeBrowserSession, detectChallenge, humanDelay, isLoggedIn, launchBrowser } from './browser';
   4: import { randomUUID } from 'crypto';
   5: import { importLeadsFromCSV } from './csvImporter';
   6: import { buildFunnelReport, runSiteCheck } from './core/audit';
   7: import { runCompanyEnrichmentBatch } from './core/companyEnrichment';
   8: import { runWorkflow } from './core/orchestrator';
   9: import { runDoctor } from './core/doctor';
  10: import { runSalesNavigatorListSync } from './core/salesNavigatorSync';
  11: import { reconcileLeadStatus } from './core/leadStateService';
  12: import { warmupSession } from './core/sessionWarmer';
  13: import {
  14:     acquireRuntimeLock,
  15:     cleanupPrivacyData,
  16:     countCompanyTargets,
  17:     getAutomationPauseState,
  18:     getDailyStatsSnapshot,
  19:     getLeadById,
  20:     getJobStatusCounts,
  21:     getSalesNavListByName,
  22:     getRuntimeLock,
  23:     getRuntimeFlag,
  24:     getLeadsWithSalesNavigatorUrls,
  25:     heartbeatRuntimeLock,
  26:     linkLeadToSalesNavList,
  27:     listCompanyTargets,
  28:     listLeadCampaignConfigs,
  29:     listOpenIncidents,
  30:     listSalesNavLists,
````
