````typescript
  58: 
  59: // Graceful shutdown: chiude DB prima di uscire per non lasciare job RUNNING.
  60: let shuttingDown = false;
  61: function setupGracefulShutdown(): void {
  62:     const handler = async (signal: string): Promise<void> => {
  63:         if (shuttingDown) return;
  64:         shuttingDown = true;
  65:         console.warn(`[SIGNAL] ${signal} ricevuto ‚Äî chiusura in corso...`);
  66:         await closeDatabase();
  67:         process.exit(0);
  68:     };
  69:     process.on('SIGINT', () => { void handler('SIGINT'); });
  70:     process.on('SIGTERM', () => { void handler('SIGTERM'); });
  71: }
  72: 
  73: function getOptionValue(args: string[], optionName: string): string | undefined {
  74:     const index = args.findIndex((value) => value === optionName);
  75:     if (index === -1 || index + 1 >= args.length) {
  76:         return undefined;
  77:     }
  78:     return args[index + 1];
  79: }
  80: 
  81: function hasOption(args: string[], optionName: string): boolean {
  82:     return args.includes(optionName);
  83: }
  84: 
  85: function parseWorkflow(input: string | undefined): WorkflowSelection {
  86:     if (input === 'invite' || input === 'check' || input === 'message' || input === 'warmup' || input === 'all') {
  87:         return input;
  88:     }
  89:     return 'all';
  90: }
  91: 
  92: function parseIntStrict(raw: string, optionName: string): number {
  93:     const parsed = Number.parseInt(raw, 10);
  94:     if (!Number.isFinite(parsed)) {
  95:         throw new Error(`Valore non valido per ${optionName}: ${raw} `);
  96:     }
  97:     return parsed;
  98: }
  99: 
 100: function parseNullableCap(raw: string, optionName: string): number | null {
 101:     const normalized = raw.trim().toLowerCase();
 102:     if (normalized === 'none' || normalized === 'null' || normalized === 'off' || normalized === '-1') {
 103:         return null;
 104:     }
 105:     const parsed = parseIntStrict(raw, optionName);
 106:     if (parsed < 0) {
 107:         throw new Error(`${optionName} deve essere >= 0 oppure none / null / off.`);
 108:     }
 109:     return parsed;
 110: }
 111: 
 112: function parsePauseMinutes(raw: string, optionName: string): number | null {
 113:     const normalized = raw.trim().toLowerCase();
 114:     if (normalized === 'none' || normalized === 'null' || normalized === 'off' || normalized === 'indefinite') {
 115:         return null;
 116:     }
 117:     const parsed = parseIntStrict(raw, optionName);
 118:     if (parsed < 1) {
 119:         throw new Error(`${optionName} deve essere >= 1 oppure none / null / off / indefinite.`);
 120:     }
 121:     return parsed;
 122: }
 123: 
 124: function parseBoolStrict(raw: string, optionName: string): boolean {
 125:     const normalized = raw.trim().toLowerCase();
 126:     if (normalized === 'true' || normalized === '1' || normalized === 'yes') return true;
 127:     if (normalized === 'false' || normalized === '0' || normalized === 'no') return false;
 128:     throw new Error(`Valore non valido per ${optionName}: ${raw} (usa true / false).`);
 129: }
 130: 
 131: function getWorkflowValue(args: string[]): string | undefined {
 132:     const explicit = getOptionValue(args, '--workflow');
 133:     if (explicit) {
 134:         return explicit;
 135:     }
 136:     const positional = args.find((value) => !value.startsWith('--'));
 137:     return positional;
 138: }
 139: 
 140: function getPositionalArgs(args: string[]): string[] {
 141:     return args.filter((value) => !value.startsWith('--'));
 142: }
 143: 
 144: function sleep(ms: number): Promise<void> {
 145:     return new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
 146: }
 147: 
 148: interface SalesNavResolveItem {
 149:     leadId: number;
 150:     status: string;
 151:     currentUrl: string;
 152:     resolvedProfileUrl: string | null;
 153:     action: 'resolved' | 'updated' | 'conflict' | 'unresolved' | 'challenge_detected' | 'error';
 154:     conflictLeadId?: number | null;
 155:     error?: string;
 156: }
 157: 
 158: interface SalesNavResolveReport {
 159:     scanned: number;
 160:     resolvable: number;
 161:     updated: number;
 162:     conflicts: number;
 163:     unresolved: number;
 164:     challengeDetected: boolean;
 165:     fix: boolean;
 166:     dryRun: boolean;
 167:     items: SalesNavResolveItem[];
 168: }
 169: 
 170: async function collectProfileUrlCandidates(page: Page): Promise<string[]> {
 171:     const candidates = new Set<string>();
 172: 
 173:     const currentUrl = page.url();
 174:     if (currentUrl) candidates.add(currentUrl);
 175: 
 176:     const canonicalHref = await page.locator('link[rel="canonical"]').first().getAttribute('href').catch(() => null);
 177:     if (canonicalHref) candidates.add(canonicalHref);
 178: 
 179:     const ogUrl = await page.locator('meta[property="og:url"]').first().getAttribute('content').catch(() => null);
 180:     if (ogUrl) candidates.add(ogUrl);
 181: 
 182:     const anchors = await page.evaluate(() => {
 183:         return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a[href]'))
 184:             .map((node) => (node as HTMLAnchorElement).href)
 185:             .filter((href) => typeof href === 'string' && href.length > 0);
 186:     }).catch(() => [] as string[]);
 187: 
 188:     for (const href of anchors) {
 189:         candidates.add(href);
 190:     }
 191: 
 192:     return Array.from(candidates);
 193: }
 194: 
 195: function pickResolvedProfileUrl(candidates: string[]): string | null {
 196:     for (const candidate of candidates) {
 197:         const normalized = normalizeLinkedInUrl(candidate);
 198:         if (!isProfileUrl(normalized)) continue;
 199:         if (isSalesNavigatorUrl(normalized)) continue;
 200:         return normalized;
 201:     }
 202:     return null;
 203: }
 204: 
 205: function getRecoveryStatusFromBlockedReason(reason: string | null): 'READY_INVITE' | 'INVITED' | 'READY_MESSAGE' | null {
 206:     const normalized = (reason ?? '').toLowerCase();
 207:     if (normalized.includes('salesnav_url_requires_profile_invite')) {
 208:         return 'READY_INVITE';
 209:     }
 210:     if (normalized.includes('salesnav_url_requires_profile_check')) {
 211:         return 'INVITED';
 212:     }
 213:     if (normalized.includes('salesnav_url_requires_profile_message')) {
 214:         return 'READY_MESSAGE';
 215:     }
 216:     return null;
 217: }
 218: 
 219: const WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY = 'workflow.runner';
 220: const WORKFLOW_RUNNER_MIN_TTL_SECONDS = 120;
 221: const WORKFLOW_RUNNER_HEARTBEAT_MS = 30_000;
 222: const AUTO_SITE_CHECK_LAST_RUN_KEY = 'site_check.last_run_at';
 223: const SALESNAV_LAST_SYNC_KEY = 'salesnav.last_sync_at';
 224: 
 225: function createLockOwnerId(command: string): string {
 226:     const suffix = randomUUID().split('-')[0];
 227:     return `${command}:${process.pid}:${suffix} `;
 228: }
 229: 
 230: function computeWorkflowLockTtlSeconds(intervalMs: number): number {
 231:     return Math.max(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_MIN_TTL_SECONDS, Math.ceil(intervalMs / 1000) + 120);
 232: }
 233: 
 234: async function acquireWorkflowRunnerLock(command: string, ttlSeconds: number, metadata: Record<string, unknown>): Promise<string> {
 235:     const ownerId = createLockOwnerId(command);
 236:     const result = await acquireRuntimeLock(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY, ownerId, ttlSeconds, metadata);
 237:     if (!result.acquired) {
 238:         const holder = result.lock;
 239:         throw new Error(
 240:             `[LOCK] Runner gi√† attivo.owner = ${holder?.owner_id ?? 'unknown'} heartbeat = ${holder?.heartbeat_at ?? 'n/a'} expires = ${holder?.expires_at ?? 'n/a'} `
 241:         );
 242:     }
 243:     console.log(`[LOCK] acquired key = ${WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY} owner = ${ownerId} ttl = ${ttlSeconds} s`);
 244:     return ownerId;
 245: }
 246: 
 247: async function heartbeatWorkflowRunnerLock(ownerId: string, ttlSeconds: number): Promise<void> {
 248:     const ok = await heartbeatRuntimeLock(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY, ownerId, ttlSeconds);
 249:     if (!ok) {
 250:         throw new Error('[LOCK] Runtime lock perso durante l\'esecuzione.');
 251:     }
 252: }
 253: 
 254: async function releaseWorkflowRunnerLock(ownerId: string): Promise<void> {
 255:     const released = await releaseRuntimeLock(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY, ownerId);
 256:     console.log(`[LOCK] released key = ${WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY} owner = ${ownerId} released = ${released} `);
 257: }
 258: 
 259: async function sleepWithLockHeartbeat(totalMs: number, ownerId: string, ttlSeconds: number): Promise<void> {
 260:     let remaining = Math.max(0, totalMs);
 261:     while (remaining > 0) {
 262:         const chunk = Math.min(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_HEARTBEAT_MS, remaining);
 263:         await sleep(chunk);
 264:         remaining -= chunk;
 265:         if (remaining > 0) {
 266:             await heartbeatWorkflowRunnerLock(ownerId, ttlSeconds);
 267:         }
 268:     }
 269: }
 270: 
 271: interface LoopDoctorGate {
 272:     proceed: boolean;
 273:     reason: string;
 274: }
 275: 
 276: interface AutoSiteCheckDecision {
 277:     shouldRun: boolean;
 278:     reason: string;
 279:     hoursSinceLastRun: number | null;
 280: }
 281: 
 282: interface SalesNavSyncDecision {
 283:     shouldRun: boolean;
 284:     reason: string;
 285:     hoursSinceLastRun: number | null;
 286: }
 287: 
 288: async function evaluateAutoSiteCheckDecision(dryRun: boolean): Promise<AutoSiteCheckDecision> {
 289:     if (dryRun) {
 290:         return { shouldRun: false, reason: 'dry_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 291:     }
 292:     if (!config.autoSiteCheckEnabled) {
 293:         return { shouldRun: false, reason: 'auto_site_check_disabled', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 294:     }
 295: 
 296:     const lastRunRaw = await getRuntimeFlag(AUTO_SITE_CHECK_LAST_RUN_KEY);
 297:     if (!lastRunRaw) {
 298:         return { shouldRun: true, reason: 'never_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 299:     }
 300: 
 301:     const parsedMs = Date.parse(lastRunRaw);
 302:     if (!Number.isFinite(parsedMs)) {
 303:         return { shouldRun: true, reason: 'invalid_last_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 304:     }
 305: 
 306:     const elapsedHours = (Date.now() - parsedMs) / (1000 * 60 * 60);
 307:     if (elapsedHours >= config.autoSiteCheckIntervalHours) {
 308:         return {
 309:             shouldRun: true,
 310:             reason: 'interval_elapsed',
 311:             hoursSinceLastRun: Number.parseFloat(elapsedHours.toFixed(2)),
 312:         };
 313:     }
 314: 
 315:     return {
 316:         shouldRun: false,
 317:         reason: 'interval_not_elapsed',
 318:         hoursSinceLastRun: Number.parseFloat(elapsedHours.toFixed(2)),
 319:     };
 320: }
 321: 
 322: async function evaluateSalesNavSyncDecision(dryRun: boolean): Promise<SalesNavSyncDecision> {
 323:     if (dryRun) {
 324:         return { shouldRun: false, reason: 'dry_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 325:     }
 326:     if (!config.salesNavSyncEnabled) {
 327:         return { shouldRun: false, reason: 'salesnav_sync_disabled', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 328:     }
 329: 
 330:     const lastRunRaw = await getRuntimeFlag(SALESNAV_LAST_SYNC_KEY);
 331:     if (!lastRunRaw) {
 332:         return { shouldRun: true, reason: 'never_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 333:     }
 334: 
 335:     const parsedMs = Date.parse(lastRunRaw);
 336:     if (!Number.isFinite(parsedMs)) {
 337:         return { shouldRun: true, reason: 'invalid_last_run', hoursSinceLastRun: null };
 338:     }
 339: 
 340:     const elapsedHours = (Date.now() - parsedMs) / (1000 * 60 * 60);
 341:     if (elapsedHours >= config.salesNavSyncIntervalHours) {
 342:         return {
 343:             shouldRun: true,
 344:             reason: 'interval_elapsed',
 345:             hoursSinceLastRun: Number.parseFloat(elapsedHours.toFixed(2)),
 346:         };
 347:     }
 348: 
 349:     return {
 350:         shouldRun: false,
 351:         reason: 'interval_not_elapsed',
 352:         hoursSinceLastRun: Number.parseFloat(elapsedHours.toFixed(2)),
 353:     };
 354: }
 355: 
 356: async function evaluateLoopDoctorGate(dryRun: boolean): Promise<LoopDoctorGate> {
 357:     if (dryRun) {
 358:         return { proceed: true, reason: 'dry_run' };
 359:     }
 360: 
 361:     const report = await runDoctor();
 362:     const syncOk = !report.sync.enabled || report.sync.configured;
 363:     if (!report.sessionLoginOk) {
 364:         return { proceed: false, reason: 'doctor_login_missing' };
 365:     }
 366:     if (report.quarantine) {
 367:         return { proceed: false, reason: 'doctor_quarantine_active' };
 368:     }
 369:     if (!syncOk) {
 370:         return { proceed: false, reason: 'doctor_sync_not_configured' };
 371:     }
 372:     return { proceed: true, reason: 'doctor_ok' };
 373: }
 374: 
 375: async function processCloudCommands(): Promise<void> {
 376:     const activeProfiles = getRuntimeAccountProfiles();
 377:     for (const profile of activeProfiles) {
 378:         try {
 379:             const cmd = await pollPendingTelegramCommand(profile.id);
 380:             if (!cmd) continue;
 381: 
 382:             console.log(`[CLOUD] Comando ricevuto: ${cmd.command} args: ${cmd.args || 'nessuno'} (account: ${profile.id})`);
 383: 
 384:             if (cmd.command === 'pausa' || cmd.command === 'pause') {
 385:                 const minutes = cmd.args && /^[0-9]+$/.test(cmd.args) ? parseInt(cmd.args, 10) : null;
 386:                 await setAutomationPause(minutes || null, 'TELEGRAM_COMMAND');
 387:                 console.log(`[CLOUD] Automazione globale in pausa ${minutes ? 'per ' + minutes + ' min' : 'indefinitamente'}.`);
 388:             } else if (cmd.command === 'riprendi' || cmd.command === 'resume') {
 389:                 await clearPauseState();
 390:                 console.log(`[CLOUD] Automazione globale ripresa.`);
 391:             } else if (cmd.command === 'restart') {
 392:                 console.warn('[CLOUD] Restart comandato. Uscita 0...');
 393:                 process.exit(0);
 394:             }
 395: 
 396:             await markTelegramCommandProcessed(cmd.id);
 397:         } catch (e) {
 398:             console.error(`[CLOUD] Errore elaborazione comando per account ${profile.id}:`, e);
 399:         }
 400:     }
 401: }
 402: 
 403: function printHelp(): void {
 404:     console.log('Utilizzo consigliato (Windows): .\\bot.ps1 <comando> [opzioni]');
 405:     console.log('Alternativa: npx ts-node src/index.ts <comando> [opzioni]');
 406:     console.log('Compatibilit√†: npm start -- <comando> [opzioni]');
 407:     console.log('Comandi principali:');
 408:     console.log('  import --file <file.csv> --list <nome_lista>');
 409:     console.log('  run invite|check|message|all (oppure --workflow <valore>)');
 410:     console.log('  dry-run invite|check|message|all (oppure --workflow <valore>)');
 411:     console.log('  run-loop [workflow] [intervalSec] [--cycles <n>] [--dry-run]');
 412:     console.log('  autopilot [intervalSec] [--cycles <n>] [--dry-run]');
 413:     console.log('  login [timeoutSec] [--account <id_account>]');
 414:     console.log('  doctor');
 415:     console.log('  status');
 416:     console.log('  proxy-status');
 417:     console.log('  funnel');
 418:     console.log('  site-check [limit] [--fix]');
 419:     console.log('  state-sync [limit] [--fix]');
 420:     console.log('  salesnav-resolve [limit] [--fix] [--dry-run]');
 421:     console.log('  salesnav-sync [listName] [--url <salesnav_list_url>] [--max-pages <n>] [--limit <n>] [--account <id>] [--dry-run]');
 422:     console.log('  salesnav-lists [--limit <n>]');
 423:     console.log('  salesnav-create-list <nome> [--account <id>]');
 424:     console.log('  salesnav-add-lead <leadId> <listName> [--account <id>]');
 425:     console.log('  salesnav-add-to-list <leadId> <listName> [--account <id>]  # alias');
 426:     console.log('  random-activity [--account <id>] [--max-actions <n>] [--dry-run]');
 427:     console.log('  enrich-targets [limit] [--dry-run]');
 428:     console.log('  pause [minutes|indefinite] [reason]');
 429:     console.log('  resume');
 430:     console.log('  unquarantine');
 431:     console.log('  incidents [open]');
 432:     console.log('  incident-resolve <id>');
 433:     console.log('  privacy-cleanup [days]');
 434:     console.log('  lists');
 435:     console.log('  company-targets [list] [limit]');
 436:     console.log('  list-config <nome_lista> [priority] [inviteCap|none] [messageCap|none] [active]');
 437:     console.log('    (oppure con opzioni: --list, --priority, --invite-cap, --message-cap, --active)');
 438:     console.log('  sync-status');
 439:     console.log('  sync-run-once');
 440:     console.log('  db-backup');
 441:     console.log('Alias retrocompatibili: connect, check, message');
 442: }
 443: 
 444: async function runImportCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 445:     const legacyPath = args[0] && !args[0].startsWith('--') ? args[0] : undefined;
 446:     const filePath = getOptionValue(args, '--file') ?? legacyPath;
 447:     const listName = getOptionValue(args, '--list') ?? 'default';
 448: 
 449:     if (!filePath) {
 450:         throw new Error('Specifica il CSV: npm start -- import --file path/to/file.csv --list nome_lista');
 451:     }
 452: 
 453:     const result = await importLeadsFromCSV(filePath, listName);
 454:     console.log(
 455:         `Import completato.Lead inseriti = ${result.inserted}, Company target inseriti = ${result.companyTargetsInserted}, Skippati = ${result.skipped}, Lista = ${listName} `
 456:     );
 457: }
 458: 
 459: async function runLoginCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 460:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 461:     const positionalTimeout = positional.find((value) => /^\d+$/.test(value));
 462:     const positionalAccount = positional.find((value) => !/^\d+$/.test(value));
 463:     const timeoutRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--timeout') ?? positionalTimeout;
 464:     const timeoutSeconds = timeoutRaw ? Math.max(30, parseIntStrict(timeoutRaw, '--timeout')) : 300;
 465:     const timeoutMs = timeoutSeconds * 1000;
 466:     const accountRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--account') ?? positionalAccount;
 467:     const selectedAccount = getAccountProfileById(accountRaw);
 468:     const availableAccounts = getRuntimeAccountProfiles().map((account) => account.id);
 469:     if (accountRaw && accountRaw !== selectedAccount.id) {
 470:         console.warn(`[LOGIN] account = ${accountRaw} non trovato.Uso account = ${selectedAccount.id}.Disponibili: ${availableAccounts.join(', ')} `);
 471:     }
 472: 
 473:     const session = await launchBrowser({
 474:         headless: false,
 475:         sessionDir: selectedAccount.sessionDir,
 476:         proxy: selectedAccount.proxy,
 477:     });
 478:     try {
 479:         await session.page.goto('https://www.linkedin.com/login', { waitUntil: 'load' });
 480:         console.log(`Completa il login LinkedIn nella finestra aperta(account = ${selectedAccount.id}, timeout ${timeoutSeconds}s)...`);
 481:         console.log('Il browser resta aperto finch√© il login non viene verificato o finch√© scade il timeout.');
 482: 
 483:         const startedAt = Date.now();
 484:         let lastLogAt = 0;
 485:         while (Date.now() - startedAt <= timeoutMs) {
 486:             if (await isLoggedIn(session.page)) {
 487:                 const confirmed = await checkLogin(session.page);
 488:                 if (confirmed) {
 489:                     console.log('Login sessione completato con successo.');
 490:                     return;
 491:                 }
 492:             }
 493:             const now = Date.now();
 494:             if (now - lastLogAt >= 15_000) {
 495:                 const remaining = Math.max(0, Math.ceil((timeoutMs - (now - startedAt)) / 1000));
 496:                 console.log(`In attesa completamento login... (${remaining}s rimanenti)`);
 497:                 lastLogAt = now;
 498:             }
 499:             await session.page.waitForTimeout(2500);
 500:         }
 501: 
 502:         // Ultimo controllo esplicito sulla home LinkedIn.
 503:         const loggedIn = await checkLogin(session.page);
 504:         if (!loggedIn) {
 505:             throw new Error(`Login non rilevato entro ${timeoutSeconds} secondi.`);
 506:         }
 507:         console.log('Login sessione completato con successo.');
 508:     } finally {
 509:         await closeBrowserSession(session);
 510:     }
 511: }
 512: 
 513: async function runLoopCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 514:     const workflow = parseWorkflow(getWorkflowValue(args));
 515:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 516:     const workflowTokens = new Set(['invite', 'check', 'message', 'all']);
 517:     const numericPositionals = positional.filter((value) => /^\d+$/.test(value));
 518:     const intervalMsRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--interval-ms');
 519:     const intervalSecRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--interval-sec');
 520:     const cyclesRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--cycles') ?? numericPositionals[1];
 521:     const dryRun = hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.some((value) => value.toLowerCase() === 'dry' || value.toLowerCase() === 'dry-run');
 522: 
 523:     let intervalMs = config.workflowLoopIntervalMs;
 524:     if (intervalMsRaw) {
 525:         intervalMs = Math.max(10_000, parseIntStrict(intervalMsRaw, '--interval-ms'));
 526:     } else if (intervalSecRaw) {
 527:         intervalMs = Math.max(10, parseIntStrict(intervalSecRaw, '--interval-sec')) * 1000;
 528:     } else {
 529:         const numericPositional = positional.find((value) => !workflowTokens.has(value) && /^\d+$/.test(value));
 530:         if (numericPositional) {
 531:             intervalMs = Math.max(10, parseIntStrict(numericPositional, 'intervalSec')) * 1000;
 532:         }
 533:     }
 534: 
 535:     const maxCycles = cyclesRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(cyclesRaw, '--cycles')) : null;
 536:     console.log(`[LOOP] start workflow = ${workflow} dryRun = ${dryRun} intervalMs = ${intervalMs} cycles = ${maxCycles ?? 'infinite'} `);
 537: 
 538:     // Avvio Poller Telegram (interno o webhook) in background a inizio loop
 539:     if (!dryRun) {
 540:         await startTelegramListener().catch(e => console.error('[TELEGRAM] Errore listener background', e));
 541:     }
 542: 
 543:     const lockTtlSeconds = computeWorkflowLockTtlSeconds(intervalMs);
 544:     const lockOwnerId = dryRun
 545:         ? null
 546:         : await acquireWorkflowRunnerLock('run-loop', lockTtlSeconds, {
 547:             workflow,
 548:             dryRun,
 549:             intervalMs,
 550:             startedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
 551:         });
 552: 
 553:     try {
 554:         let cycle = 0;
 555:         while (true) {
 556:             cycle += 1;
 557:             const started = new Date().toISOString();
 558:             console.log(`[LOOP] cycle = ${cycle} started_at = ${started} `);
 559: 
 560:             let runId: number | null = null;
 561:             let profilesDiscoveredThisRun = 0;
 562:             let runStatus: RunStatus = 'RUNNING';
 563:             const localDate = getLocalDateString();
 564:             const preStats = await getDailyStatsSnapshot(localDate);
 565:             if (!dryRun) {
 566:                 runId = await startCampaignRun();
 567:             }
 568: 
 569:             try {
 570:                 if (lockOwnerId) {
 571:                     await heartbeatWorkflowRunnerLock(lockOwnerId, lockTtlSeconds);
 572:                 }
 573: 
 574:                 if (!dryRun) {
 575:                     await processCloudCommands();
 576:                 }
 577: 
 578:                 const doctorGate = await evaluateLoopDoctorGate(dryRun);
 579:                 if (!doctorGate.proceed) {
 580:                     console.warn(`[LOOP] cycle = ${cycle} skipped reason = ${doctorGate.reason} `);
 581:                 } else {
 582:                     const autoSiteCheck = await evaluateAutoSiteCheckDecision(dryRun);
 583:                     if (autoSiteCheck.shouldRun) {
 584:                         const siteCheckReport = await runSiteCheck({
 585:                             limitPerStatus: config.autoSiteCheckLimit,
 586:                             autoFix: config.autoSiteCheckFix,
 587:                         });
 588:                         await setRuntimeFlag(AUTO_SITE_CHECK_LAST_RUN_KEY, new Date().toISOString());
 589:                         console.log('[LOOP] auto-site-check', {
 590:                             reason: autoSiteCheck.reason,
 591:                             intervalHours: config.autoSiteCheckIntervalHours,
 592:                             limitPerStatus: config.autoSiteCheckLimit,
 593:                             staleDays: config.siteCheckStaleDays,
 594:                             autoFix: config.autoSiteCheckFix,
 595:                             report: siteCheckReport,
 596:                         });
 597: 
 598:                         // Sostituiamo il vecchio decoy pattern basilare con il nuovo motore avanzato Session Warming
 599:                         if (!dryRun) {
 600:                             try {
 601:                                 const warmupSessionInstance = await launchBrowser({ headless: config.headless });
 602:                                 try {
 603:                                     await warmupSession(warmupSessionInstance.page);
 604:                                 } finally {
 605:                                     await closeBrowserSession(warmupSessionInstance);
 606:                                 }
 607:                             } catch (e) {
 608:                                 console.log('[LOOP] Errore nel Session Warmer, ignoro (non fatale):', e);
 609:                             }
 610:                         }
 611:                     } else {
 612:                         console.log('[LOOP] auto-site-check skipped', autoSiteCheck);
 613:                     }
 614: 
 615:                     if (config.salesNavSyncEnabled && (workflow === 'all' || workflow === 'invite')) {
 616:                         const salesNavDecision = await evaluateSalesNavSyncDecision(dryRun);
 617:                         if (salesNavDecision.shouldRun) {
 618:                             const salesNavSyncReport = await runSalesNavigatorListSync({
 619:                                 listName: config.salesNavSyncListName,
 620:                                 listUrl: config.salesNavSyncListUrl || undefined,
 621:                                 maxPages: config.salesNavSyncMaxPages,
 622:                                 maxLeadsPerList: config.salesNavSyncLimit,
 623:                                 dryRun,
 624:                                 accountId: config.salesNavSyncAccountId || undefined,
 625:                             });
 626:                             await setRuntimeFlag(SALESNAV_LAST_SYNC_KEY, new Date().toISOString());
 627:                             console.log('[LOOP] salesnav-sync', {
 628:                                 reason: salesNavDecision.reason,
 629:                                 intervalHours: config.salesNavSyncIntervalHours,
 630:                                 limitPerList: config.salesNavSyncLimit,
 631:                                 report: salesNavSyncReport,
 632:                             });
 633:                         } else {
 634:                             console.log('[LOOP] salesnav-sync skipped', salesNavDecision);
 635:                         }
 636:                     }
 637: 
 638:                     // Auto-Backup Giornaliero SQLite
 639:                     if (!dryRun) {
 640:                         const AUTO_BACKUP_LAST_RUN_KEY = 'db_backup.last_run_at';
 641:                         const backupLastRunRaw = await getRuntimeFlag(AUTO_BACKUP_LAST_RUN_KEY);
 642:                         const shouldRunBackup = !backupLastRunRaw || (Date.now() - Date.parse(backupLastRunRaw)) > 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
 643:                         if (shouldRunBackup) {
 644:                             try {
 645:                                 const backupPath = await backupDatabase();
 646:                                 await setRuntimeFlag(AUTO_BACKUP_LAST_RUN_KEY, new Date().toISOString());
 647:                                 console.log(`[LOOP] Auto - backup giornaliero completato: ${backupPath} `);
 648:                             } catch (e) {
 649:                                 console.error(`[LOOP] Auto - backup fallito`, e);
 650:                             }
 651:                         }
 652:                     }
 653: 
 654:                     if (config.companyEnrichmentEnabled && (workflow === 'all' || workflow === 'invite')) {
 655:                         const enrichment = await runCompanyEnrichmentBatch({
 656:                             limit: config.companyEnrichmentBatch,
 657:                             maxProfilesPerCompany: config.companyEnrichmentMaxProfilesPerCompany,
 658:                             dryRun,
 659:                         });
 660:                         profilesDiscoveredThisRun += enrichment.createdLeads;
 661:                         console.log('[LOOP] enrichment', enrichment);
 662:                     }
 663:                     await runWorkflow({ workflow, dryRun });
 664: 
 665:                     if (!dryRun && config.randomActivityEnabled && Math.random() <= config.randomActivityProbability) {
 666:                         const randomActivityReport = await runRandomLinkedinActivity({
 667:                             accountId: config.salesNavSyncAccountId || undefined,
 668:                             maxActions: config.randomActivityMaxActions,
 669:                             dryRun,
 670:                         });
 671:                         console.log('[LOOP] random-activity', randomActivityReport);
 672:                     }
 673: 
 674:                     runStatus = 'SUCCESS';
 675:                     console.log(`[LOOP] cycle = ${cycle} completed`);
 676:                 }
 677:             } catch (error) {
 678:                 console.error(`[LOOP] cycle = ${cycle} failed`, error);
 679:                 runStatus = 'FAILED';
 680:             } finally {
 681:                 if (runId) {
 682:                     const postStats = await getDailyStatsSnapshot(localDate);
 683:                     const invitesDiff = Math.max(0, postStats.invitesSent - preStats.invitesSent);
 684:                     const messagesDiff = Math.max(0, postStats.messagesSent - preStats.messagesSent);
 685:                     const errorsDiff = Math.max(0, postStats.runErrors - preStats.runErrors);
 686: 
 687:                     await finishCampaignRun(runId, runStatus, {
 688:                         discovered: profilesDiscoveredThisRun,
 689:                         invites: invitesDiff,
 690:                         messages: messagesDiff,
 691:                         errors: errorsDiff
 692:                     });
 693:                     console.log(`[LOOP] Campaign run ${runId} completed with status ${runStatus}`);
 694:                 }
 695:             }
 696: 
 697:             if (maxCycles !== null && cycle >= maxCycles) {
 698:                 console.log(`[LOOP] completed ${cycle} cycle(s).`);
 699:                 break;
 700:             }
 701: 
 702:             console.log(`[LOOP] waiting ${Math.floor(intervalMs / 1000)}s before next cycle...`);
 703:             if (lockOwnerId) {
 704:                 await sleepWithLockHeartbeat(intervalMs, lockOwnerId, lockTtlSeconds);
 705:             } else {
 706:                 await sleep(intervalMs);
 707:             }
 708:         }
 709:     } finally {
 710:         if (lockOwnerId) {
 711:             await releaseWorkflowRunnerLock(lockOwnerId);
 712:         }
 713:     }
 714: }
 715: 
 716: async function runAutopilotCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 717:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 718:     const intervalRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--interval-sec') ?? positional[0];
 719:     const cyclesRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--cycles') ?? positional[1];
 720:     const intervalArg = intervalRaw ?? String(Math.floor(config.workflowLoopIntervalMs / 1000));
 721:     const forwarded = ['all', intervalArg];
 722:     if (cyclesRaw && /^\d+$/.test(cyclesRaw)) {
 723:         forwarded.push('--cycles', cyclesRaw);
 724:     }
 725:     if (hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.includes('dry') || positional.includes('dry-run')) {
 726:         forwarded.push('--dry-run');
 727:     }
 728:     await runLoopCommand(forwarded);
 729: }
 730: 
 731: async function runWorkflowCommand(workflow: WorkflowSelection, dryRun: boolean): Promise<void> {
 732:     if (dryRun) {
 733:         await runWorkflow({ workflow, dryRun: true });
 734:         return;
 735:     }
 736: 
 737:     const lockTtlSeconds = Math.max(300, config.jobStuckMinutes * 60 + 300);
 738:     const lockOwnerId = await acquireWorkflowRunnerLock('run', lockTtlSeconds, {
 739:         workflow,
 740:         dryRun: false,
 741:         startedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
 742:     });
 743:     try {
 744:         await runWorkflow({ workflow, dryRun: false });
 745:         await heartbeatWorkflowRunnerLock(lockOwnerId, lockTtlSeconds);
 746:     } finally {
 747:         await releaseWorkflowRunnerLock(lockOwnerId);
 748:     }
 749: }
 750: 
 751: async function runFunnelCommand(): Promise<void> {
 752:     const report = await buildFunnelReport();
 753:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
 754: }
 755: 
 756: async function runSiteCheckCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 757:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 758:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[0];
 759:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : 25;
 760:     const autoFix = hasOption(args, '--fix') || positional.includes('fix');
 761:     const report = await runSiteCheck({ limitPerStatus: limit, autoFix });
 762:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
 763: }
 764: 
 765: async function runStateSyncCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 766:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 767:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[0];
 768:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : config.postRunStateSyncLimit;
 769:     const autoFix = hasOption(args, '--fix') || positional.includes('fix') || config.postRunStateSyncFix;
 770:     const report = await runSiteCheck({ limitPerStatus: limit, autoFix });
 771:     console.log(JSON.stringify({
 772:         mode: 'state_sync',
 773:         limitPerStatus: limit,
 774:         autoFix,
 775:         report,
 776:     }, null, 2));
 777: }
 778: 
 779: async function runSalesNavSyncCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 780:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 781:     const dryRun = hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.includes('dry-run') || positional.includes('dry');
 782:     const listName = getOptionValue(args, '--list') ?? positional[0] ?? config.salesNavSyncListName;
 783:     const listUrl = getOptionValue(args, '--url') ?? positional[1] ?? config.salesNavSyncListUrl;
 784:     const maxPagesRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--max-pages');
 785:     const maxPages = maxPagesRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(maxPagesRaw, '--max-pages')) : config.salesNavSyncMaxPages;
 786:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit');
 787:     const maxLeadsPerList = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : config.salesNavSyncLimit;
 788:     const accountId = getOptionValue(args, '--account') ?? config.salesNavSyncAccountId;
 789: 
 790:     const report = await runSalesNavigatorListSync({
 791:         listName: listName?.trim() ? listName : null,
 792:         listUrl: listUrl?.trim() ? listUrl : null,
 793:         maxPages,
 794:         maxLeadsPerList,
 795:         dryRun,
 796:         accountId: accountId || undefined,
 797:     });
 798:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
 799: }
 800: 
 801: async function runSalesNavListsCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 802:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 803:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[0];
 804:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : 200;
 805:     const lists = await listSalesNavLists(limit);
 806:     console.log(JSON.stringify({ total: lists.length, items: lists }, null, 2));
 807: }
 808: 
 809: async function runSalesNavCreateListCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 810:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 811:     const listName = getOptionValue(args, '--name') ?? positional[0];
 812:     const accountId = getOptionValue(args, '--account') ?? config.salesNavSyncAccountId;
 813:     if (!listName || !listName.trim()) {
 814:         throw new Error('Specifica nome lista: salesnav-create-list <nome>');
 815:     }
 816:     const result = await createSalesNavList(listName, accountId || undefined);
 817:     let dbListId: number | null = null;
 818:     let dbSyncError: string | null = null;
 819: 
 820:     if (result.ok) {
 821:         try {
 822:             const normalizedName = (result.listName ?? listName).trim();
 823:             if (result.listUrl) {
 824:                 const listRow = await upsertSalesNavList(normalizedName, result.listUrl);
 825:                 dbListId = listRow.id;
 826:             } else {
 827:                 const existing = await getSalesNavListByName(normalizedName);
 828:                 dbListId = existing?.id ?? null;
 829:             }
 830:         } catch (error) {
 831:             dbSyncError = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
 832:         }
 833:     }
 834: 
 835:     console.log(JSON.stringify({
 836:         ...result,
 837:         dbSync: {
 838:             listId: dbListId,
 839:             synced: dbListId !== null,
 840:             error: dbSyncError,
 841:         },
 842:     }, null, 2));
 843: }
 844: 
 845: async function runSalesNavAddLeadCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 846:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 847:     const leadIdRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--lead-id') ?? positional[0];
 848:     const listName = getOptionValue(args, '--list') ?? positional[1];
 849:     const accountId = getOptionValue(args, '--account') ?? config.salesNavSyncAccountId;
 850: 
 851:     if (!leadIdRaw) {
 852:         throw new Error('Specifica leadId: salesnav-add-lead <leadId> <listName>');
 853:     }
 854:     if (!listName || !listName.trim()) {
 855:         throw new Error('Specifica listName: salesnav-add-lead <leadId> <listName>');
 856:     }
 857: 
 858:     const leadId = Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(leadIdRaw, '--lead-id'));
 859:     const lead = await getLeadById(leadId);
 860:     if (!lead) {
 861:         throw new Error(`Lead non trovato: ${leadId} `);
 862:     }
 863: 
 864:     const result = await addLeadToSalesNavList(lead.linkedin_url, listName, accountId || undefined);
 865:     const targetListName = (result.listName ?? listName).trim();
 866:     let dbListId: number | null = null;
 867:     let dbLinked = false;
 868:     let dbSyncError: string | null = null;
 869: 
 870:     if (result.ok) {
 871:         try {
 872:             let listRow = await getSalesNavListByName(targetListName);
 873:             if (!listRow && result.listUrl) {
 874:                 listRow = await upsertSalesNavList(targetListName, result.listUrl);
 875:             }
 876:             if (listRow) {
 877:                 dbListId = listRow.id;
 878:                 await linkLeadToSalesNavList(listRow.id, leadId);
 879:                 dbLinked = true;
 880:             }
 881:         } catch (error) {
 882:             dbSyncError = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
 883:         }
 884:     }
 885: 
 886:     console.log(JSON.stringify({
 887:         leadId,
 888:         listName,
 889:         leadUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
 890:         dbSync: {
 891:             listId: dbListId,
 892:             linked: dbLinked,
 893:             error: dbSyncError,
 894:         },
 895:         ...result,
 896:     }, null, 2));
 897: }
 898: 
 899: async function runProxyStatusCommand(): Promise<void> {
 900:     const status = getProxyPoolStatus();
 901:     const failoverChain = getProxyFailoverChain().map((proxy, index) => ({
 902:         order: index + 1,
 903:         server: proxy.server,
 904:         auth: !!proxy.username || !!proxy.password,
 905:     }));
 906: 
 907:     console.log(JSON.stringify({
 908:         ...status,
 909:         failoverChain,
 910:     }, null, 2));
 911: }
 912: 
 913: async function runRandomActivityCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 914:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 915:     const maxActionsRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--max-actions')
 916:         ?? getOptionValue(args, '--actions')
 917:         ?? positional.find((value) => /^\d+$/.test(value));
 918:     const accountId = getOptionValue(args, '--account')
 919:         ?? positional.find((value) => {
 920:             const normalized = value.toLowerCase();
 921:             if (normalized === 'dry' || normalized === 'dry-run') return false;
 922:             return !value.startsWith('--') && !/^\d+$/.test(value);
 923:         })
 924:         ?? config.salesNavSyncAccountId
 925:         ?? undefined;
 926:     const dryRun = hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.includes('dry') || positional.includes('dry-run');
 927:     const maxActions = maxActionsRaw
 928:         ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(maxActionsRaw, '--max-actions'))
 929:         : config.randomActivityMaxActions;
 930: 
 931:     const report = await runRandomLinkedinActivity({
 932:         accountId: accountId || undefined,
 933:         maxActions,
 934:         dryRun,
 935:     });
 936:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
 937: }
 938: 
 939: async function runSalesNavResolveCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
 940:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
 941:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[0];
 942:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : 25;
 943:     const fix = hasOption(args, '--fix') || positional.includes('fix');
 944:     const dryRun = hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.includes('dry-run') || positional.includes('dry');
 945: 
 946:     const leads = await getLeadsWithSalesNavigatorUrls(limit);
 947:     const report: SalesNavResolveReport = {
 948:         scanned: 0,
 949:         resolvable: 0,
 950:         updated: 0,
 951:         conflicts: 0,
 952:         unresolved: 0,
 953:         challengeDetected: false,
 954:         fix,
 955:         dryRun,
 956:         items: [],
 957:     };
 958: 
 959:     if (leads.length === 0) {
 960:         console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
 961:         return;
 962:     }
 963: 
 964:     const session = await launchBrowser({ headless: config.headless });
 965:     try {
 966:         const loggedIn = await checkLogin(session.page);
 967:         if (!loggedIn) {
 968:             throw new Error('Sessione LinkedIn non autenticata. Esegui prima: .\\bot.ps1 login');
 969:         }
 970: 
 971:         for (const lead of leads) {
 972:             report.scanned += 1;
 973:             try {
 974:                 await session.page.goto(lead.linkedin_url, { waitUntil: 'domcontentloaded' });
 975:                 await humanDelay(session.page, 1000, 2000);
 976: 
 977:                 if (await detectChallenge(session.page)) {
 978:                     report.challengeDetected = true;
 979:                     report.items.push({
 980:                         leadId: lead.id,
 981:                         status: lead.status,
 982:                         currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
 983:                         resolvedProfileUrl: null,
 984:                         action: 'challenge_detected',
 985:                     });
 986:                     break;
 987:                 }
 988: 
 989:                 const candidates = await collectProfileUrlCandidates(session.page);
 990:                 const resolvedProfileUrl = pickResolvedProfileUrl(candidates);
 991:                 if (!resolvedProfileUrl) {
 992:                     report.unresolved += 1;
 993:                     report.items.push({
 994:                         leadId: lead.id,
 995:                         status: lead.status,
 996:                         currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
 997:                         resolvedProfileUrl: null,
 998:                         action: 'unresolved',
 999:                     });
1000:                     continue;
1001:                 }
1002: 
1003:                 report.resolvable += 1;
1004:                 if (!fix || dryRun) {
1005:                     report.items.push({
1006:                         leadId: lead.id,
1007:                         status: lead.status,
1008:                         currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
1009:                         resolvedProfileUrl,
1010:                         action: 'resolved',
1011:                     });
1012:                     continue;
1013:                 }
1014: 
1015:                 const updated = await updateLeadLinkedinUrl(lead.id, resolvedProfileUrl);
1016:                 if (updated.updated) {
1017:                     const recoveryStatus = lead.status === 'BLOCKED'
1018:                         ? getRecoveryStatusFromBlockedReason(lead.blocked_reason)
1019:                         : null;
1020:                     if (recoveryStatus) {
1021:                         await reconcileLeadStatus(lead.id, recoveryStatus, 'salesnav_profile_url_resolved', {
1022:                             previousStatus: lead.status,
1023:                             blockedReason: lead.blocked_reason,
1024:                         });
1025:                     }
1026:                     report.updated += 1;
1027:                     report.items.push({
1028:                         leadId: lead.id,
1029:                         status: lead.status,
1030:                         currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
1031:                         resolvedProfileUrl,
1032:                         action: 'updated',
1033:                     });
1034:                 } else {
1035:                     report.conflicts += 1;
1036:                     report.items.push({
1037:                         leadId: lead.id,
1038:                         status: lead.status,
1039:                         currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
1040:                         resolvedProfileUrl,
1041:                         action: 'conflict',
1042:                         conflictLeadId: updated.conflictLeadId,
1043:                     });
1044:                 }
1045:             } catch (error) {
1046:                 report.items.push({
1047:                     leadId: lead.id,
1048:                     status: lead.status,
1049:                     currentUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
1050:                     resolvedProfileUrl: null,
1051:                     action: 'error',
1052:                     error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error),
1053:                 });
1054:             }
1055:         }
1056:     } finally {
1057:         await closeBrowserSession(session);
1058:     }
1059: 
1060:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
1061: }
1062: 
1063: async function runEnrichTargetsCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
1064:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
1065:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[0];
1066:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : config.companyEnrichmentBatch;
1067:     const dryRun = hasOption(args, '--dry-run') || positional.includes('dry') || positional.includes('dry-run');
1068:     const report = await runCompanyEnrichmentBatch({
1069:         limit,
1070:         maxProfilesPerCompany: config.companyEnrichmentMaxProfilesPerCompany,
1071:         dryRun,
1072:     });
1073:     console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
1074: }
1075: 
1076: async function runStatusCommand(): Promise<void> {
1077:     const localDate = getLocalDateString();
1078:     const [
1079:         quarantineFlag,
1080:         pauseState,
1081:         incidents,
1082:         jobStatusCounts,
1083:         dailyStats,
1084:         syncStatus,
1085:         runnerLock,
1086:         autoSiteCheckLastRunAt,
1087:         salesNavSyncLastRunAt,
1088:     ] = await Promise.all([
1089:         getRuntimeFlag('account_quarantine'),
1090:         getAutomationPauseState(),
1091:         listOpenIncidents(),
1092:         getJobStatusCounts(),
1093:         getDailyStatsSnapshot(localDate),
1094:         getEventSyncStatus(),
1095:         getRuntimeLock(WORKFLOW_RUNNER_LOCK_KEY),
1096:         getRuntimeFlag(AUTO_SITE_CHECK_LAST_RUN_KEY),
1097:         getRuntimeFlag(SALESNAV_LAST_SYNC_KEY),
1098:     ]);
1099: 
1100:     const payload = {
1101:         localDate,
1102:         quarantine: quarantineFlag === 'true',
1103:         accounts: getRuntimeAccountProfiles().map((account) => ({
1104:             id: account.id,
1105:             sessionDir: account.sessionDir,
1106:             dedicatedProxy: !!account.proxy,
1107:         })),
1108:         pause: pauseState,
1109:         openIncidents: incidents.length,
1110:         jobs: jobStatusCounts,
1111:         proxy: getProxyPoolStatus(),
1112:         dailyStats,
1113:         sync: syncStatus,
1114:         runnerLock,
1115:         autoSiteCheck: {
1116:             enabled: config.autoSiteCheckEnabled,
1117:             fix: config.autoSiteCheckFix,
1118:             limitPerStatus: config.autoSiteCheckLimit,
1119:             intervalHours: config.autoSiteCheckIntervalHours,
1120:             staleDays: config.siteCheckStaleDays,
1121:             lastRunAt: autoSiteCheckLastRunAt,
1122:         },
1123:         stateSync: {
1124:             postRunEnabled: config.postRunStateSyncEnabled,
1125:             postRunLimit: config.postRunStateSyncLimit,
1126:             postRunFix: config.postRunStateSyncFix,
1127:         },
1128:         salesNavSync: {
1129:             enabled: config.salesNavSyncEnabled,
1130:             listName: config.salesNavSyncListName,
1131:             listUrlConfigured: !!config.salesNavSyncListUrl.trim(),
1132:             maxPages: config.salesNavSyncMaxPages,
1133:             intervalHours: config.salesNavSyncIntervalHours,
1134:             limitPerList: config.salesNavSyncLimit,
1135:             accountId: config.salesNavSyncAccountId || null,
1136:             lastRunAt: salesNavSyncLastRunAt,
1137:         },
1138:         randomActivity: {
1139:             enabled: config.randomActivityEnabled,
1140:             probability: config.randomActivityProbability,
1141:             maxActions: config.randomActivityMaxActions,
1142:         },
1143:         ai: {
1144:             personalizationEnabled: config.aiPersonalizationEnabled,
1145:             guardianEnabled: config.aiGuardianEnabled,
1146:             model: config.aiModel,
1147:             openaiConfigured: isOpenAIConfigured(),
1148:             guardianMinIntervalMinutes: config.aiGuardianMinIntervalMinutes,
1149:             guardianPauseMinutes: config.aiGuardianPauseMinutes,
1150:         },
1151:     };
1152:     console.log(JSON.stringify(payload, null, 2));
1153: }
1154: 
1155: async function runPauseCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
1156:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
1157:     const minutesRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--minutes') ?? positional[0];
1158:     const reasonRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--reason') ?? (positional.length > 1 ? positional.slice(1).join(' ') : 'manual_pause');
1159: 
1160:     const minutes = minutesRaw
1161:         ? parsePauseMinutes(minutesRaw, '--minutes')
1162:         : config.autoPauseMinutesOnFailureBurst;
1163:     const pausedUntil = await setAutomationPause(minutes, reasonRaw);
1164:     const renderedUntil = pausedUntil ?? 'manual resume';
1165:     console.log(`Automazione in pausa.pausedUntil=${renderedUntil} reason = ${reasonRaw} `);
1166: }
1167: 
1168: async function runResumeCommand(): Promise<void> {
1169:     await clearPauseState();
1170:     console.log('Pausa automazione rimossa.');
1171: }
1172: 
1173: async function runUnquarantineCommand(): Promise<void> {
1174:     await setQuarantine(false);
1175:     await clearPauseState();
1176:     console.log('Quarantine disattivata e pausa rimossa.');
1177: }
1178: 
1179: async function runResolveIncidentCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
1180:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
1181:     const idRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--id') ?? positional[0];
1182:     if (!idRaw) {
1183:         throw new Error('Specifica ID incidente: npm start -- incident-resolve <id>');
1184:     }
1185:     const incidentId = parseIntStrict(idRaw, '--id');
1186:     if (incidentId < 1) {
1187:         throw new Error('--id deve essere >= 1');
1188:     }
1189:     await resolveIncident(incidentId);
1190:     console.log(`Incidente ${incidentId} risolto.`);
1191: }
1192: 
1193: async function runPrivacyCleanupCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
1194:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
1195:     const daysRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--days') ?? positional[0];
1196:     const days = daysRaw ? Math.max(7, parseIntStrict(daysRaw, '--days')) : config.retentionDays;
1197:     const result = await cleanupPrivacyData(days);
1198:     console.log(JSON.stringify({ retentionDays: days, ...result }, null, 2));
1199: }
1200: 
1201: async function runCompanyTargetsCommand(args: string[]): Promise<void> {
1202:     const positional = getPositionalArgs(args);
1203:     const listName = getOptionValue(args, '--list') ?? positional[0] ?? null;
1204:     const limitRaw = getOptionValue(args, '--limit') ?? positional[1];
1205:     const limit = limitRaw ? Math.max(1, parseIntStrict(limitRaw, '--limit')) : 50;
1206:     const [total, items] = await Promise.all([
1207:         countCompanyTargets(listName ?? undefined),
1208:         listCompanyTargets(listName, limit),
1209:     ]);
1210:     console.log(JSON.stringify({ list: listName ?? 'all', total, shown: items.length, items }, null, 2));
1211: }
1212: 
1213: async function runDbBackupCommand(): Promise<void> {
1214:     console.log('Avvio backup database manuale...');
1215:     try {
1216:         const backupPath = await backupDatabase();
1217:         console.log(`Backup completato con successo.File salvato in: ${backupPath} `);
1218:     } catch (e) {
1219:         console.error('Errore durante il backup del database:', e);
1220:     }
1221: }
1222: 
1223: async function main(): Promise<void> {
1224:     setupGracefulShutdown();
1225:     const args = process.argv.slice(2);
1226:     const command = args[0];
1227:     const commandArgs = args.slice(1);
1228: 
1229:     await initDatabase();
1230:     const shouldRecoverStuckJobs = command === 'run'
1231:         || command === 'connect'
1232:         || command === 'check'
1233:         || command === 'message'
1234:         || (command === 'run-loop' && !hasOption(commandArgs, '--dry-run'));
1235:     if (shouldRecoverStuckJobs) {
1236:         const recoveredJobs = await recoverStuckJobs(config.jobStuckMinutes);
1237:         if (recoveredJobs > 0) {
1238:             console.warn(`[BOOT] Ripristinati ${recoveredJobs} job RUNNING bloccati da oltre ${config.jobStuckMinutes} minuti.`);
1239:         }
1240:     }
1241: 
1242:     switch (command) {
1243:         case 'import':
1244:             await runImportCommand(commandArgs);
1245:             break;
1246:         case 'run': {
1247:             const workflow = parseWorkflow(getWorkflowValue(commandArgs));
1248:             await runWorkflowCommand(workflow, false);
1249:             break;
1250:         }
1251:         case 'dry-run': {
1252:             const workflow = parseWorkflow(getWorkflowValue(commandArgs));
1253:             await runWorkflowCommand(workflow, true);
1254:             break;
1255:         }
1256:         case 'run-loop':
1257:             await runLoopCommand(commandArgs);
1258:             break;
1259:         case 'autopilot':
1260:             await runAutopilotCommand(commandArgs);
1261:             break;
1262:         case 'login':
1263:             await runLoginCommand(commandArgs);
1264:             break;
1265:         case 'doctor': {
1266:             const report = await runDoctor();
1267:             console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
1268:             break;
1269:         }
1270:         case 'funnel':
1271:             await runFunnelCommand();
1272:             break;
1273:         case 'site-check':
1274:             await runSiteCheckCommand(commandArgs);
1275:             break;
1276:         case 'state-sync':
1277:             await runStateSyncCommand(commandArgs);
1278:             break;
1279:         case 'salesnav-sync':
1280:             await runSalesNavSyncCommand(commandArgs);
1281:             break;
1282:         case 'salesnav-lists':
1283:             await runSalesNavListsCommand(commandArgs);
1284:             break;
1285:         case 'salesnav-create-list':
1286:             await runSalesNavCreateListCommand(commandArgs);
1287:             break;
1288:         case 'salesnav-add-lead':
1289:             await runSalesNavAddLeadCommand(commandArgs);
1290:             break;
1291:         case 'salesnav-add-to-list':
1292:             await runSalesNavAddLeadCommand(commandArgs);
1293:             break;
1294:         case 'salesnav-resolve':
1295:             await runSalesNavResolveCommand(commandArgs);
1296:             break;
1297:         case 'enrich-targets':
1298:             await runEnrichTargetsCommand(commandArgs);
1299:             break;
1300:         case 'status':
1301:             await runStatusCommand();
1302:             break;
1303:         case 'proxy-status':
1304:             await runProxyStatusCommand();
1305:             break;
1306:         case 'random-activity':
1307:             await runRandomActivityCommand(commandArgs);
1308:             break;
1309:         case 'pause':
1310:             await runPauseCommand(commandArgs);
1311:             break;
1312:         case 'resume':
1313:             await runResumeCommand();
1314:             break;
1315:         case 'unquarantine':
1316:             await runUnquarantineCommand();
1317:             break;
1318:         case 'incidents': {
1319:             const positional = getPositionalArgs(commandArgs);
1320:             const openOnly = commandArgs.includes('--open') || positional.includes('open') || positional.length === 0;
1321:             if (!openOnly) {
1322:                 console.log('Usa: npm start -- incidents open');
1323:                 break;
1324:             }
1325:             const incidents = await listOpenIncidents();
1326:             console.log(JSON.stringify(incidents, null, 2));
1327:             break;
1328:         }
1329:         case 'incident-resolve':
1330:             await runResolveIncidentCommand(commandArgs);
1331:             break;
1332:         case 'privacy-cleanup':
1333:             await runPrivacyCleanupCommand(commandArgs);
1334:             break;
1335:         case 'lists': {
1336:             const lists = await listLeadCampaignConfigs(false);
1337:             console.log(JSON.stringify(lists, null, 2));
1338:             break;
1339:         }
1340:         case 'company-targets':
1341:             await runCompanyTargetsCommand(commandArgs);
1342:             break;
1343:         case 'list-config': {
1344:             const positional = getPositionalArgs(commandArgs);
1345:             const listName = getOptionValue(commandArgs, '--list') ?? positional[0];
1346:             if (!listName) {
1347:                 throw new Error('Specifica la lista: npm start -- list-config --list <nome_lista> ...');
1348:             }
1349: 
1350:             const patch: {
1351:                 priority?: number;
1352:                 dailyInviteCap?: number | null;
1353:                 dailyMessageCap?: number | null;
1354:                 isActive?: boolean;
1355:             } = {};
1356: 
1357:             const priorityRaw = getOptionValue(commandArgs, '--priority') ?? positional[1];
1358:             if (hasOption(commandArgs, '--priority') || priorityRaw !== undefined) {
1359:                 const raw = priorityRaw;
1360:                 if (!raw) throw new Error('Manca valore per --priority');
1361:                 const parsed = parseIntStrict(raw, '--priority');
1362:                 if (parsed < 1) throw new Error('--priority deve essere >= 1');
1363:                 patch.priority = parsed;
1364:             }
1365:             const inviteCapRaw = getOptionValue(commandArgs, '--invite-cap') ?? positional[2];
1366:             if (hasOption(commandArgs, '--invite-cap') || inviteCapRaw !== undefined) {
1367:                 const raw = inviteCapRaw;
1368:                 if (!raw) throw new Error('Manca valore per --invite-cap');
1369:                 patch.dailyInviteCap = parseNullableCap(raw, '--invite-cap');
1370:             }
1371:             const messageCapRaw = getOptionValue(commandArgs, '--message-cap') ?? positional[3];
1372:             if (hasOption(commandArgs, '--message-cap') || messageCapRaw !== undefined) {
1373:                 const raw = messageCapRaw;
1374:                 if (!raw) throw new Error('Manca valore per --message-cap');
1375:                 patch.dailyMessageCap = parseNullableCap(raw, '--message-cap');
1376:             }
1377:             const activeRaw = getOptionValue(commandArgs, '--active') ?? positional[4];
1378:             if (hasOption(commandArgs, '--active') || activeRaw !== undefined) {
1379:                 const raw = activeRaw;
1380:                 if (!raw) throw new Error('Manca valore per --active');
1381:                 patch.isActive = parseBoolStrict(raw, '--active');
1382:             }
1383: 
1384:             const updated = await updateLeadCampaignConfig(listName, patch);
1385:             console.log(JSON.stringify(updated, null, 2));
1386:             break;
1387:         }
1388:         case 'sync-status': {
1389:             const status = await getEventSyncStatus();
1390:             console.log(JSON.stringify(status, null, 2));
1391:             break;
1392:         }
1393:         case 'sync-run-once':
1394:             await runEventSyncOnce();
1395:             console.log('Sync eventi completato.');
1396:             break;
1397:         case 'db-backup':
1398:             await runDbBackupCommand();
1399:             break;
1400:         case 'connect':
1401:             await runWorkflowCommand('invite', false);
1402:             break;
1403:         case 'check':
1404:             await runWorkflowCommand('check', false);
1405:             break;
1406:         case 'message':
1407:             await runWorkflowCommand('message', false);
1408:             break;
1409:         case 'warmup':
1410:             await runWorkflowCommand('warmup', false);
1411:             break;
1412:         case 'daily-report':
1413:             await generateAndSendDailyReport();
1414:             break;
1415:         case 'dashboard':
1416:             await initDatabase(); // Initialize DB for the server
1417:             startServer(3000);
1418:             console.log('Premi Ctrl+C per fermare la Dashboard e spegnere il database.');
1419:             // Block the process to keep the DB connection alive
1420:             await new Promise(() => { });
1421:             break;
1422:         default:
1423:             printHelp();
1424:             break;
1425:     }
1426: }
1427: 
1428: main()
1429:     .catch((error) => {
1430:         console.error('[FATAL]', error);
1431:         process.exitCode = 1;
1432:     })
1433:     .finally(async () => {
1434:         await closeDatabase();
1435:     });
````

## File: src/workers/inviteWorker.ts
````typescript
  1: import { Page } from 'playwright';
  2: import { detectChallenge, humanDelay, humanMouseMove, humanType, simulateHumanReading } from '../browser';
  3: import { transitionLead } from '../core/leadStateService';
  4: import { getLeadById, incrementDailyStat, incrementListDailyStat, updateLeadScrapedContext, updateLeadPromptVariant } from '../core/repositories';
  5: import { SELECTORS } from '../selectors';
  6: import { InviteJobPayload, LeadRecord } from '../types/domain';
  7: import { WorkerContext } from './context';
  8: import { ChallengeDetectedError, RetryableWorkerError } from './errors';
  9: import { isSalesNavigatorUrl } from '../linkedinUrl';
 10: import { config } from '../config';
 11: import { buildPersonalizedInviteNote } from '../ai/inviteNotePersonalizer';
 12: import { pauseAutomation } from '../risk/incidentManager';
 13: import { bridgeDailyStat, bridgeLeadStatus } from '../cloud/cloudBridge';
 14: 
 15: async function clickConnectOnProfile(page: Page): Promise<boolean> {
 16:     const primaryBtn = page.locator(SELECTORS.connectButtonPrimary).first();
 17:     if (await primaryBtn.count() > 0) {
 18:         await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.connectButtonPrimary);
 19:         await humanDelay(page, 120, 320);
 20:         await primaryBtn.click();
 21:         return true;
 22:     }
 23: 
 24:     const moreBtn = page.locator(SELECTORS.moreActionsButton).first();
 25:     if (await moreBtn.count() > 0) {
 26:         await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.moreActionsButton);
 27:         await humanDelay(page, 120, 300);
 28:         await moreBtn.click();
 29:         await humanDelay(page, 700, 1300);
 30:         const connectInMenu = page.locator(SELECTORS.connectInMoreMenu).first();
 31:         if (await connectInMenu.count() > 0) {
 32:             await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.connectInMoreMenu);
 33:             await humanDelay(page, 120, 300);
 34:             await connectInMenu.click();
 35:             return true;
 36:         }
 37:     }
 38: 
 39:     return false;
 40: }
 41: 
 42: async function detectInviteProof(page: Page): Promise<boolean> {
 43:     const pendingCount = await page.locator(SELECTORS.invitePendingIndicators).count();
 44:     if (pendingCount > 0) {
 45:         return true;
 46:     }
 47: 
 48:     const pageText = await page.textContent('body').catch(() => '');
 49:     if (!pageText) {
 50:         return false;
 51:     }
 52:     return /invitation sent|in attesa|pending/i.test(pageText);
 53: }
 54: 
 55: async function detectWeeklyInviteLimit(page: Page): Promise<boolean> {
 56:     const selectorCount = await page.locator(SELECTORS.inviteWeeklyLimitSignals).count();
 57:     if (selectorCount > 0) {
 58:         return true;
 59:     }
 60: 
 61:     const pageText = await page.textContent('body').catch(() => '');
 62:     if (!pageText) {
 63:         return false;
 64:     }
 65:     return /weekly invitation limit|limite settimanale(?: degli)? inviti|hai raggiunto il limite settimanale/i.test(pageText);
 66: }
 67: 
 68: /**
 69:  * Tenta di inviare l'invito con nota personalizzata (se INVITE_WITH_NOTE=true).
 70:  * Flusso:
 71:  *   1. Cerca il bottone "Add a note" nel modale
 72:  *   2. Scrive la nota via humanType
 73:  *   3. Clicca "Send" dal modale
 74:  * Se il bottone "Add a note" non √® presente, ricade su sendWithoutNote.
 75:  * Ritorna se l'invio √® avvenuto con nota e la source della nota (template/ai).
 76:  */
 77: async function handleInviteModal(
 78:     page: Page,
 79:     lead: LeadRecord,
 80:     dryRun: boolean,
 81:     localDate: string,
 82: ): Promise<{ sentWithNote: boolean; noteSource: 'template' | 'ai' | null; variant?: string | null }> {
 83:     if (dryRun) return { sentWithNote: false, noteSource: null, variant: null };
 84: 
 85:     // Controlla se c'√® il bottone "Add a note" (con retry breve se il modale sta caricando)
 86:     const addNoteBtn = page.locator(SELECTORS.addNoteButton).first();
 87:     let canAddNote = await addNoteBtn.count() > 0;
 88:     if (config.inviteWithNote && !canAddNote) {
 89:         await page.waitForSelector(SELECTORS.addNoteButton, { timeout: 2000 }).catch(() => null);
 90:         canAddNote = await addNoteBtn.count() > 0;
 91:     }
 92: 
 93:     if (config.inviteWithNote && canAddNote) {
 94:         await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.addNoteButton);
 95:         await humanDelay(page, 150, 350);
 96:         await addNoteBtn.click();
 97:         await humanDelay(page, 600, 1200);
 98: 
 99:         // Scrivi la nota nella textarea del modale
100:         const generatedNote = await buildPersonalizedInviteNote(lead);
101:         if (generatedNote.variant) {
102:             await updateLeadPromptVariant(lead.id, generatedNote.variant);
103:             lead.invite_prompt_variant = generatedNote.variant;
104:         }
105: 
106:         try {
107:             await humanType(page, SELECTORS.noteTextarea, generatedNote.note);
108:         } catch {
109:             await incrementDailyStat(localDate, 'selector_failures');
110:             throw new RetryableWorkerError('Impossibile digitare la nota', 'TYPE_ERROR');
111:         }
112: 
113:         await humanDelay(page, 400, 800); // Changed from context.session.page to page
114: 
115:         const sendWithNote = page.locator(SELECTORS.sendWithNote).first(); // Changed from context.session.page to page
116:         if (await sendWithNote.count() > 0) {
117:             await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.sendWithNote); // Changed from context.session.page to page
118:             await humanDelay(page, 150, 400); // Changed from context.session.page to page
119: 
120:             if (!dryRun) { // Changed from context.dryRun to dryRun
121:                 await sendWithNote.click();
122:             } else {
123:                 console.log(`[DRY RUN] Inviato invito a ${lead.linkedin_url} (nota: ${generatedNote.source} - var: ${generatedNote.variant || 'none'})`);
124:             }
125: 
126:             return { sentWithNote: true, noteSource: generatedNote.source, variant: generatedNote.variant };
127:         }
128: 
129:         // Se il bottone Send del modale non √® trovato, √® un errore bloccante
130:         await incrementDailyStat(localDate, 'selector_failures');
131:         throw new RetryableWorkerError('Send con nota non trovato nel modale', 'SEND_WITH_NOTE_NOT_FOUND');
132:     }
133: 
134:     // Fallback: invia senza nota
135:     const sendWithoutNote = page.locator(SELECTORS.sendWithoutNote).first();
136:     if (await sendWithoutNote.count() > 0) {
137:         await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.sendWithoutNote);
138:         await humanDelay(page, 120, 300);
139:         await sendWithoutNote.click();
140:         return { sentWithNote: false, noteSource: null, variant: null };
141:     }
142: 
143:     const fallback = page.locator(SELECTORS.sendFallback).first();
144:     if (await fallback.count() > 0) {
145:         await humanMouseMove(page, SELECTORS.sendFallback);
146:         await humanDelay(page, 120, 300);
147:         await fallback.click();
148:         return { sentWithNote: false, noteSource: null, variant: null };
149:     }
150: 
151:     await incrementDailyStat(localDate, 'selector_failures');
152:     throw new RetryableWorkerError('Conferma invito senza nota non trovata', 'SEND_BUTTON_NOT_FOUND');
153: }
154: 
155: export async function processInviteJob(payload: InviteJobPayload, context: WorkerContext): Promise<void> {
156:     const lead = await getLeadById(payload.leadId);
157:     if (!lead) {
158:         throw new RetryableWorkerError(`Lead ${payload.leadId} non trovato`, 'LEAD_NOT_FOUND');
159:     }
160: 
161:     if (lead.status === 'NEW' || lead.status === 'PENDING') {
162:         await transitionLead(lead.id, 'READY_INVITE', 'new_lead_promoted');
163:     }
164: 
165:     if (lead.status !== 'READY_INVITE' && lead.status !== 'NEW' && lead.status !== 'PENDING') {
166:         return;
167:     }
168: 
169:     if (isSalesNavigatorUrl(lead.linkedin_url)) {
170:         await transitionLead(lead.id, 'BLOCKED', 'salesnav_url_requires_profile_invite');
171:         return;
172:     }
173: 
174:     await context.session.page.goto(lead.linkedin_url, { waitUntil: 'domcontentloaded' });
175:     await simulateHumanReading(context.session.page);
176: 
177:     if (await detectChallenge(context.session.page)) {
178:         throw new ChallengeDetectedError();
179:     }
180: 
181:     // --- PHASE 7: AI Context Extraction (About & Experience) ---
182:     try {
183:         let extractedAbout: string | null = null;
184:         let extractedExperience: string | null = null;
185: 
186:         const aboutLocator = context.session.page.locator(SELECTORS.aboutSection).first();
187:         if (await aboutLocator.isVisible()) {
188:             extractedAbout = (await aboutLocator.innerText()).trim();
189:         }
190: 
191:         const expLocator = context.session.page.locator(SELECTORS.experienceSection).first();
192:         if (await expLocator.isVisible()) {
193:             extractedExperience = (await expLocator.innerText()).trim();
194:         }
195: 
196:         if (extractedAbout || extractedExperience) {
197:             await updateLeadScrapedContext(lead.id, extractedAbout || null, extractedExperience || null);
198:             lead.about = extractedAbout || null;
199:             lead.experience = extractedExperience || null;
200: 
201:             // Sync with Cloud
202:             bridgeLeadStatus(lead.linkedin_url, lead.status, {
203:                 about: extractedAbout || null,
204:                 experience: extractedExperience || null
205:             });
206:         }
207:     } catch (e) {
208:         // Estrazione Opzionale. Ignorare errori di timeout o parsing DOM
209:         console.warn(`[WARN] Impossibile estrarre contesto AI per lead ${lead.id}:`, e);
210:     }
211:     // --- END PHASE 7 ---
212: 
213:     const connectClicked = await clickConnectOnProfile(context.session.page);
214:     if (!connectClicked) {
215:         await incrementDailyStat(context.localDate, 'selector_failures');
216:         await transitionLead(lead.id, 'SKIPPED', 'connect_not_found');
217:         return;
218:     }
219: 
220:     await humanDelay(context.session.page, 900, 1800);
221: 
222:     const inviteResult = await handleInviteModal(
223:         context.session.page,
224:         lead,
225:         context.dryRun,
226:         context.localDate,
227:     );
228: 
229:     if (!context.dryRun) {
230:         const weeklyLimitReached = await detectWeeklyInviteLimit(context.session.page);
231:         if (weeklyLimitReached) {
232:             await pauseAutomation(
233:                 'WEEKLY_INVITE_LIMIT_REACHED',
234:                 {
235:                     leadId: lead.id,
236:                     linkedinUrl: lead.linkedin_url,
237:                     accountId: context.accountId,
238:                 },
239:                 7 * 24 * 60
240:             );
241:             throw new RetryableWorkerError('Limite settimanale inviti raggiunto', 'WEEKLY_LIMIT_REACHED');
242:         }
243:     }
244: 
245:     await humanDelay(context.session.page, 1200, 2200);
246:     const proofOfSend = context.dryRun ? true : await detectInviteProof(context.session.page);
247:     if (!proofOfSend) {
248:         throw new RetryableWorkerError('Proof-of-send non rilevato', 'NO_PROOF_OF_SEND');
249:     }
250: 
251:     await transitionLead(lead.id, 'INVITED', context.dryRun ? 'invite_dry_run' : 'invite_sent', {
252:         dryRun: context.dryRun,
253:         withNote: inviteResult.sentWithNote,
254:         withNoteSource: inviteResult.noteSource,
255:         variant: inviteResult.variant || null
256:     });
257:     await incrementDailyStat(context.localDate, 'invites_sent');
258:     await incrementListDailyStat(context.localDate, lead.list_name, 'invites_sent');
259:     // Cloud sync non-bloccante
260:     bridgeLeadStatus(lead.linkedin_url, 'INVITED', {
261:         invited_at: new Date().toISOString(),
262:         invite_prompt_variant: inviteResult.variant || null,
263:         invite_note_sent: inviteResult.sentWithNote ? 'yes' : 'no'
264:     });
265:     bridgeDailyStat(context.localDate, context.accountId, 'invites_sent');
266: }
````
